    330 </a><a href="#h2-0-64" id="h2-0-64" class="i">+&lt;/header&gt;
    331 </a><a href="#h2-0-65" id="h2-0-65" class="i">+        &lt;main tabindex=&quot;-1&quot; id=&quot;main-content&quot;&gt;
    332 </a><a href="#h2-0-66" id="h2-0-66" class="i">+            
    333 </a><a href="#h2-0-67" id="h2-0-67" class="i">+    &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header ]&quot;&gt;
    334 </a><a href="#h2-0-68" id="h2-0-68" class="i">+    &lt;div class=&quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&quot;&gt;
    335 </a><a href="#h2-0-69" id="h2-0-69" class="i">+        &lt;h1&gt;10 Tips for Website Redesign in 2020&lt;/h1&gt;
    336 </a><a href="#h2-0-70" id="h2-0-70" class="i">+        
    337 </a><a href="#h2-0-71" id="h2-0-71" class="i">+            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
    338 </a><a href="#h2-0-72" id="h2-0-72" class="i">+                
    339 </a><a href="#h2-0-73" id="h2-0-73" class="i">+&lt;time datetime=&quot;Jan 1, 2020&quot;&gt;Jan 1, 2020&lt;/time&gt;

    341 </a><a href="#h2-0-75" id="h2-0-75" class="i">+    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;

    343 </a><a href="#h2-0-77" id="h2-0-77" class="i">+        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;

    359 </a><a href="#h2-0-93" id="h2-0-93" class="i">+            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum &lt;strong&gt;verbis&lt;/strong&gt;, fertur &lt;em&gt;fas&lt;/em&gt; poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum &lt;a href=&quot;#murmurat-veros-tepescunt&quot;&gt;illis&lt;/a&gt;, et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.&lt;/p&gt;

format(&quot;svg&quot;)}.wrapper{position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;max-width:70rem;padding:0 1.33rem}.constrained{position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;max-width:40rem}.site-head{padding:1.6rem 0}.site-footer{margin-top:auto;padding:1.6rem 0;border-top:1px solid ul{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center;gap:1rem}.site-footer li{display:flex;flex-direction:column;flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center;margin-inline-start:1rem}.site-footer     417 </a><a href="#h3-0-10" id="h3-0-10" class="i">+        &lt;/style&gt;

    502 </a><a href="#h3-0-95" id="h3-0-95" class="i">+    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
    503 </a><a href="#h3-0-96" id="h3-0-96" class="i">+        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
    504 </a><a href="#h3-0-97" id="h3-0-97" class="i">+            &lt;p&gt;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat. Cura rapta dum praepositam inhaesit, laeto sceleratus vicina utque. Annos nunc sumitur ignes ac nequit minanti.&lt;/p&gt;
    505 </a><a href="#h3-0-98" id="h3-0-98" class="i">+

    649 </a><a href="#h4-0-97" id="h4-0-97" class="i">+            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum &lt;strong&gt;verbis&lt;/strong&gt;, fertur &lt;em&gt;fas&lt;/em&gt; poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum &lt;a href=&quot;#murmurat-veros-tepescunt&quot;&gt;illis&lt;/a&gt;, et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.&lt;/p&gt;

    790 </a><a href="#h5-0-93" id="h5-0-93" class="i">+            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum ait. Plaustrum gaudet: similis pulsarunt inmortalis multa cui et huic altera nil; non ingenio tormenta visa.&lt;/p&gt;

    792 </a><a href="#h5-0-95" id="h5-0-95" class="i">+&lt;p&gt;Matre quid vescitur Paris hunc rependatur cursus vitasset tenebrae nec! Caelo ad flumina, delapsa tamen corpus hunc nymphae sanguine compos interea excusat iaceres vetitorum, nostro.&lt;/p&gt;

    934 </a><a href="#h6-0-93" id="h6-0-93" class="i">+            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum purpura dolorem! Paterque gentis nam &lt;strong&gt;consilii&lt;/strong&gt; temptanti comitum epulae hic iuvene inducta cava talia solebat iussit.&lt;/p&gt;
    935 </a><a href="#h6-0-94" id="h6-0-94" class="i">+&lt;blockquote&gt;
    936 </a><a href="#h6-0-95" id="h6-0-95" class="i">+&lt;p&gt;Natasque iacebat curvantem me iactat atque: non deus si omnia Buten inquit confinia ausa repertum virum. In iniusta libertas inposuitque probant, &lt;em&gt;ut iubasque&lt;/em&gt; dignus aethera vale mitem tecumque insidias concita, quis modo egentes. Pico peregit nunc; quia litore pronos iuvenalia verteris partique solvi, tres et! Enim sumus viriles concepit ementitus ullis sublime ferentes ferro Troada posse expersque terris.&lt;/p&gt;
    937 </a><a href="#h6-0-96" id="h6-0-96" class="i">+&lt;/blockquote&gt;

   1877 </a><a href="#h37-2-25" id="h37-2-25" class="i">+            
   1878 </a><a href="#h37-2-26" id="h37-2-26" class="i">+                &lt;article class=&quot;featured-article&quot;&gt;
   1879 </a><a href="#h37-2-27" id="h37-2-27" class="i">+                    &lt;a href=&quot;/blog/a-complete-guide-to-wireframe-design/&quot; class=&quot;[ link ] [ featured-article__title ]&quot;&gt;
   1880 </a><a href="#h37-2-28" id="h37-2-28" class="i">+                        A Complete Guide to Wireframe Design
   1881 </a><a href="#h37-2-29" id="h37-2-29" class="i">+                    &lt;/a&gt;

   1884 </a><a href="#h37-2-32" id="h37-2-32" class="i">+                            &lt;time class=&quot;featured-article__date&quot; datetime=&quot;Apr 12, 2020&quot;&gt;Apr 12, 2020&lt;/time&gt;
   1885 </a><a href="#h37-2-33" id="h37-2-33" class="i">+                           
   1886 </a><a href="#h37-2-34" id="h37-2-34" class="i">+

   1891 </a><a href="#h37-2-39" id="h37-2-39" class="i">+                        &lt;/span&gt;
   1892 </a><a href="#h37-2-40" id="h37-2-40" class="i">+                        Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat.

1.33rem}.constrained{position:relative;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;max-width:40rem}.site-head{padding:1.6rem    1970 </a><a href="#h38-0-16" id="h38-0-16" class="d">-                    .post-list__item{padding-bottom:4rem}.post-list__item__info{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:1rem;color:rgba(248,248,248,.68);gap:1.25rem}.post-list__item__info a{text-decoration-color:#e9a6a6;padding:.2rem .4rem;background-color:#864879;border-radius:10%}.post-list__item__date{padding-bottom:.8rem 0}.post-list__item__excerpt{padding:1.25rem 0}.post-list__link{font-size:2rem;color:#e9a6a6;text-decoration:none;font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:700}.post-list__link:hover{color:#864879}.tags-list{display:flex;justify-content:space-around}.page-content{line-height:1.6;padding-bottom:1.6rem}.page-content blockquote{border-inline-start:1rem solid;padding-inline-start:1.6rem;padding-top:1.6rem;padding-bottom:1.6rem;margin-top:1.6rem;margin-bottom:1.6rem;font-style:italic;border:solid 2px #864879;padding:20px 30px 20px 30px;box-shadow:13px 13px 0 0 #3f3351,15px 15px 0 0 #864879,15px 11px 0 0 #864879,11px 15px 0 0 #864879}.page-content h2{font-size:2rem}.page-content h3{font-size:1.6rem}.page-content li+li{margin-top:.8rem}.page-content h2,.page-content h3{margin-top:.8rem;margin-bottom:.8rem}.page-content h2+*,.page-content h3+*{--flow-space:0.8rem}.page-content p{margin-top:1.25rem;margin-bottom:1.25rem}time[datetime]{display:block;color:#e9a6a6;font-size:2rem;font-style:italic}

   2038 </a><a href="#h38-0-84" id="h38-0-84" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2039 </a><a href="#h38-0-85" id="h38-0-85" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   2040 </a><a href="#h38-0-86" id="h38-0-86" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum &lt;strong&gt;verbis&lt;/strong&gt;, fertur &lt;em&gt;fas&lt;/em&gt; poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum &lt;a href=&quot;#murmurat-veros-tepescunt&quot;&gt;illis&lt;/a&gt;, et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.&lt;/p&gt;
   2041 </a><a href="#h38-0-87" id="h38-0-87" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   2042 </a><a href="#h38-0-88" id="h38-0-88" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Addenda ventis non&lt;/li&gt;
   2043 </a><a href="#h38-0-89" id="h38-0-89" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Sol inpia ne arboreis&lt;/li&gt;
   2044 </a><a href="#h38-0-90" id="h38-0-90" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Iam grates voluit cumque&lt;/li&gt;
   2045 </a><a href="#h38-0-91" id="h38-0-91" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Vestigia et clipei adhaeret atque aristas collaque&lt;/li&gt;
   2046 </a><a href="#h38-0-92" id="h38-0-92" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Furialibus Aonius morati optari nullique Hersilie manus&lt;/li&gt;
   2047 </a><a href="#h38-0-93" id="h38-0-93" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   2048 </a><a href="#h38-0-94" id="h38-0-94" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-dispositam-terribilis-quae&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-dispositam-terribilis-quae&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Dispositam terribilis quae&lt;/h2&gt;
   2049 </a><a href="#h38-0-95" id="h38-0-95" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Cognoscite gerens causam circumstant &lt;em&gt;luctus cupioque&lt;/em&gt; morte, fera coniunx frustra Cnosiacaeque, cupidisque tempus Achaia. Pericla multis blanda! Et terribili, nec, &lt;strong&gt;trepidans&lt;/strong&gt; pro; toto nam urbesque.&lt;/p&gt;
   2050 </a><a href="#h38-0-96" id="h38-0-96" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Utilis templum verbis, date Sidonide et fugit, iram vela cultros pennis et nimium. Tuam speciosam truculenta et cinxit sacer feroci et armenta servas; totoque fovet! Diversa ite profugi bella fugit viasque, velint sinu sic Iliades aquas gutture &lt;em&gt;asper&lt;/em&gt; Neptunus.&lt;/p&gt;
   2051 </a><a href="#h38-0-97" id="h38-0-97" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-tu-viginti-non&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-tu-viginti-non&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Tu viginti non&lt;/h2&gt;
   2052 </a><a href="#h38-0-98" id="h38-0-98" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Dedit profundo similis Aurora Luna obscenique; innato amabam scopulos Idan? Ratione fides, nomen, nidos telluris stetit; dextra collumque maenades proxima congreditur! Inquit in dixere noverca manerem; dis omnia meri postquam nostris calidis fraudesque, &lt;strong&gt;imis&lt;/strong&gt;. &lt;strong&gt;Probavit coniunx quoque&lt;/strong&gt;, me mentior geniti fatorum vulnus.&lt;/p&gt;
   2053 </a><a href="#h38-0-99" id="h38-0-99" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   2054 </a><a href="#h38-0-100" id="h38-0-100" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Est et haec bitumine documenta ora at&lt;/li&gt;
   2055 </a><a href="#h38-0-101" id="h38-0-101" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Possent herbas&lt;/li&gt;
   2056 </a><a href="#h38-0-102" id="h38-0-102" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Iacens caelo guttae&lt;/li&gt;
   2057 </a><a href="#h38-0-103" id="h38-0-103" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Unus regni&lt;/li&gt;
   2058 </a><a href="#h38-0-104" id="h38-0-104" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ad aras pueroque nomen&lt;/li&gt;
   2059 </a><a href="#h38-0-105" id="h38-0-105" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   2060 </a><a href="#h38-0-106" id="h38-0-106" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-ut-iugo-quod&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-ut-iugo-quod&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Ut iugo quod&lt;/h2&gt;
   2061 </a><a href="#h38-0-107" id="h38-0-107" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;In Alce ergo vestem Dixit pede non ut &lt;strong&gt;sumit&lt;/strong&gt; exercent. Illi portus; pedes nomine &lt;a href=&quot;#duxerat-fudit&quot;&gt;praeferre rarescit cadit&lt;/a&gt; magni, indignantibus iram herbarum omnibus alter. Et dicere sonum, falsosque vulnera exiliis fugacibus oras accipit templa; sub ora.&lt;/p&gt;
   2062 </a><a href="#h38-0-108" id="h38-0-108" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   2063 </a><a href="#h38-0-109" id="h38-0-109" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Quae equos versus iura leti germanae sibi&lt;/li&gt;
   2064 </a><a href="#h38-0-110" id="h38-0-110" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Vertice innubere velox et postquam fugae credulitate&lt;/li&gt;
   2065 </a><a href="#h38-0-111" id="h38-0-111" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Mihi scelerataque extendi nec istis nostris caput&lt;/li&gt;
   2066 </a><a href="#h38-0-112" id="h38-0-112" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   2067 </a><a href="#h38-0-113" id="h38-0-113" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Tellure liceat sive serpens, erat quamvis, mihi: vultus mihi &lt;a href=&quot;#relicta&quot;&gt;contra frater&lt;/a&gt;. Arce constitit Cimmerios quod, pedes, cetera, totoque dixit misit &lt;a href=&quot;#quae-verba&quot;&gt;adapertaque addidici dabat&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
   2068 </a><a href="#h38-0-114" id="h38-0-114" class="d">-
   2069 </a><a href="#h38-0-115" id="h38-0-115" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2070 </a><a href="#h38-0-116" id="h38-0-116" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   2071 </a><a href="#h38-0-117" id="h38-0-117" class="d">-
   2072 </a><a href="#h38-0-118" id="h38-0-118" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;
   2073 </a><a href="#h38-0-119" id="h38-0-119" class="d">-        &lt;footer class=&quot;site-footer&quot;&gt;
   2074 </a><a href="#h38-0-120" id="h38-0-120" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;
   2075 </a><a href="#h38-0-121" id="h38-0-121" class="d">-        &lt;nav class=&quot;site-footer__navigation&quot; aria-label=&quot;Secondary&quot;&gt;

   2079 </a><a href="#h38-0-125" id="h38-0-125" class="d">-                        &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&quot; rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;Build with Eleventy&lt;/a&gt;
   2080 </a><a href="#h38-0-126" id="h38-0-126" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;

h1{font-size:5rem}}root{--flow-space:1.6rem}html{font-size:18px}body{display:flex;flex-direction:column;background:#0a0a19;color:#f8f8f8;line-height:1.5;font-size:1.25rem;font-family:Nunito,Arial,sans-serif;overflow-x:hidden;min-height:100vh}main:focus{outline:0}h1,h2,h3,h4{font-weight:900;font-family:Lora,serif}a{color:inherit}:focus{outline:2px    2125 </a><a href="#h39-0-10" id="h39-0-10" class="d">-        &lt;/style&gt;

   2130 </a><a href="#h39-0-15" id="h39-0-15" class="d">-                &lt;style&gt;
   2131 </a><a href="#h39-0-16" id="h39-0-16" class="d">-                    .post-list__item{padding-bottom:4rem}.post-list__item__info{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:1rem;color:rgba(248,248,248,.68);gap:1.25rem}.post-list__item__info a{text-decoration-color:#e9a6a6;padding:.2rem .4rem;background-color:#864879;border-radius:10%}.post-list__item__date{padding-bottom:.8rem 0}.post-list__item__excerpt{padding:1.25rem 0}.post-list__link{font-size:2rem;color:#e9a6a6;text-decoration:none;font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:700}.post-list__link:hover{color:#864879}.tags-list{display:flex;justify-content:space-around}.page-content{line-height:1.6;padding-bottom:1.6rem}.page-content blockquote{border-inline-start:1rem solid;padding-inline-start:1.6rem;padding-top:1.6rem;padding-bottom:1.6rem;margin-top:1.6rem;margin-bottom:1.6rem;font-style:italic;border:solid 2px #864879;padding:20px 30px 20px 30px;box-shadow:13px 13px 0 0 #3f3351,15px 15px 0 0 #864879,15px 11px 0 0 #864879,11px 15px 0 0 #864879}.page-content h2{font-size:2rem}.page-content h3{font-size:1.6rem}.page-content li+li{margin-top:.8rem}.page-content h2,.page-content h3{margin-top:.8rem;margin-bottom:.8rem}.page-content h2+*,.page-content h3+*{--flow-space:0.8rem}.page-content p{margin-top:1.25rem;margin-bottom:1.25rem}time[datetime]{display:block;color:#e9a6a6;font-size:2rem;font-style:italic}

   2173 </a><a href="#h39-0-58" id="h39-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;A Complete Guide to Wireframe Design&lt;/h1&gt;
   2174 </a><a href="#h39-0-59" id="h39-0-59" class="d">-        
   2175 </a><a href="#h39-0-60" id="h39-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   2176 </a><a href="#h39-0-61" id="h39-0-61" class="d">-                
   2177 </a><a href="#h39-0-62" id="h39-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Apr 12, 2020&quot;&gt;Apr 12, 2020&lt;/time&gt;
   2178 </a><a href="#h39-0-63" id="h39-0-63" class="d">-
   2179 </a><a href="#h39-0-64" id="h39-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2180 </a><a href="#h39-0-65" id="h39-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   2181 </a><a href="#h39-0-66" id="h39-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   2182 </a><a href="#h39-0-67" id="h39-0-67" class="d">-            
   2183 </a><a href="#h39-0-68" id="h39-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   2184 </a><a href="#h39-0-69" id="h39-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/tutorial/&quot;&gt;#Tutorial&lt;/a&gt;
   2185 </a><a href="#h39-0-70" id="h39-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   2186 </a><a href="#h39-0-71" id="h39-0-71" class="d">-            
   2187 </a><a href="#h39-0-72" id="h39-0-72" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   2188 </a><a href="#h39-0-73" id="h39-0-73" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/learning/&quot;&gt;#Learning&lt;/a&gt;
   2189 </a><a href="#h39-0-74" id="h39-0-74" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   2190 </a><a href="#h39-0-75" id="h39-0-75" class="d">-            
   2191 </a><a href="#h39-0-76" id="h39-0-76" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   2192 </a><a href="#h39-0-77" id="h39-0-77" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/featured/&quot;&gt;#Featured&lt;/a&gt;
   2193 </a><a href="#h39-0-78" id="h39-0-78" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   2194 </a><a href="#h39-0-79" id="h39-0-79" class="d">-            
   2195 </a><a href="#h39-0-80" id="h39-0-80" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   2196 </a><a href="#h39-0-81" id="h39-0-81" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2197 </a><a href="#h39-0-82" id="h39-0-82" class="d">-
   2198 </a><a href="#h39-0-83" id="h39-0-83" class="d">-
   2199 </a><a href="#h39-0-84" id="h39-0-84" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   2200 </a><a href="#h39-0-85" id="h39-0-85" class="d">-        
   2201 </a><a href="#h39-0-86" id="h39-0-86" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2202 </a><a href="#h39-0-87" id="h39-0-87" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   2203 </a><a href="#h39-0-88" id="h39-0-88" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2204 </a><a href="#h39-0-89" id="h39-0-89" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   2205 </a><a href="#h39-0-90" id="h39-0-90" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat. Cura rapta dum praepositam inhaesit, laeto sceleratus vicina utque. Annos nunc sumitur ignes ac nequit minanti.&lt;/p&gt;
   2206 </a><a href="#h39-0-91" id="h39-0-91" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-latus-formam-supplex-dea-ante-cupies-sanguisque&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-latus-formam-supplex-dea-ante-cupies-sanguisque&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Latus formam supplex dea ante cupies sanguisque&lt;/h2&gt;
   2207 </a><a href="#h39-0-92" id="h39-0-92" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Et mors praebebat et acciperet flammas meque gravida quam quid. Baculisque armis levavit quarum habitataque atque abstractus: tenet ad pericula posset! Semesaque cura super concursibus enim communis caede &lt;strong&gt;iam illa eduxit&lt;/strong&gt;, commissa acies, alto sit &lt;a href=&quot;#te-aestuat&quot;&gt;soror&lt;/a&gt; aut?&lt;/p&gt;
   2208 </a><a href="#h39-0-93" id="h39-0-93" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2209 </a><a href="#h39-0-94" id="h39-0-94" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Sigei pontus quondam, sed, anus duos nec: tamen? Marito fiuntque Baccho causam. Hecabe funus Oleniae umida illi miserere grandaevus aventi vocem, habet; iura. Ambae Phrygiisque magnis &lt;a href=&quot;#hunc&quot;&gt;spectemur&lt;/a&gt; Erigoneque vates. Colla trahebat tamen nec datis mihi colorum &lt;a href=&quot;#et-fata-locis&quot;&gt;vidit&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
   2210 </a><a href="#h39-0-95" id="h39-0-95" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2211 </a><a href="#h39-0-96" id="h39-0-96" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-fuit-cypro&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-fuit-cypro&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Fuit Cypro&lt;/h2&gt;
   2212 </a><a href="#h39-0-97" id="h39-0-97" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Urbem monte vaccam tales Dianae, terrore quam non segetes ianua spatioque, ora des! Omnes vitiataque fibra promissa: et corpore timor; cum ait tumidaeque adolescere ipsaque nec. Facilem non ne forte Pergama corporis morbi removete amnes, movere loca &lt;a href=&quot;#primaque&quot;&gt;lumina Rutuli&lt;/a&gt;, opus est poenamque. Campos dicere, replet placidi citharaque titulum in oritur ex omnibus &lt;strong&gt;patitur&lt;/strong&gt;! Dixit Taygetenque album Deoia Troiae et utinam ergo animam tacita flores &lt;em&gt;visa&lt;/em&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
   2213 </a><a href="#h39-0-98" id="h39-0-98" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   2214 </a><a href="#h39-0-99" id="h39-0-99" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Sed pro dicturus matres&lt;/li&gt;
   2215 </a><a href="#h39-0-100" id="h39-0-100" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Tremendos annos cunctosque mugiat videns&lt;/li&gt;
   2216 </a><a href="#h39-0-101" id="h39-0-101" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ait in recipit nutricis in rapimur velox&lt;/li&gt;
   2217 </a><a href="#h39-0-102" id="h39-0-102" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Prosiliunt propior quamvis altera tumulo sensit&lt;/li&gt;
   2218 </a><a href="#h39-0-103" id="h39-0-103" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Florem leve inclusas cernere eandem nobis&lt;/li&gt;
   2219 </a><a href="#h39-0-104" id="h39-0-104" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Orchamus protinus&lt;/li&gt;
   2220 </a><a href="#h39-0-105" id="h39-0-105" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   2221 </a><a href="#h39-0-106" id="h39-0-106" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Tum est prendique acerbo! Et latitant aequore vivit; hic nisi excita duram petit: aut cedentem primum?&lt;/p&gt;
   2222 </a><a href="#h39-0-107" id="h39-0-107" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   2223 </a><a href="#h39-0-108" id="h39-0-108" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Dentibus inque rigidum dici vigil&lt;/li&gt;
   2224 </a><a href="#h39-0-109" id="h39-0-109" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Popularis solitas amicis certos maneant discedite Sisyphe&lt;/li&gt;
   2225 </a><a href="#h39-0-110" id="h39-0-110" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Nec verba&lt;/li&gt;
   2226 </a><a href="#h39-0-111" id="h39-0-111" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Mihi patriumque abnuat formas&lt;/li&gt;
   2227 </a><a href="#h39-0-112" id="h39-0-112" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Piscem blandaque in nervoque corpus qua longo&lt;/li&gt;
   2228 </a><a href="#h39-0-113" id="h39-0-113" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Quid hanc puerile imbres&lt;/li&gt;
   2229 </a><a href="#h39-0-114" id="h39-0-114" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   2230 </a><a href="#h39-0-115" id="h39-0-115" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-percussit-clamor-heu-senes-vixque-cur&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-percussit-clamor-heu-senes-vixque-cur&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Percussit clamor heu senes vixque cur&lt;/h2&gt;
   2231 </a><a href="#h39-0-116" id="h39-0-116" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Nihil Phoebeius, ferro ferrataque limenque est facies &lt;em&gt;et&lt;/em&gt; amet Troianaque. Repetenda umor iuvenes, &lt;em&gt;dum probat freta&lt;/em&gt; nec arvis mersura. Regia qua quam despectat.&lt;/p&gt;
   2232 </a><a href="#h39-0-117" id="h39-0-117" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2233 </a><a href="#h39-0-118" id="h39-0-118" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Suos est? Dat duras magis fuit: domus vobis. Petis pervenientia vidit axis sanae, ore corpora turba, nova mutat. Fervoribus lumen, nam concursibus non alta quatenus, &lt;a href=&quot;#natae-aeneadae-fingit&quot;&gt;in undis comae&lt;/a&gt; doceri aequore excute. Limosi genitor, doles invia: &lt;a href=&quot;#pependit-bracchia-quidem&quot;&gt;vidisse rauco&lt;/a&gt; vocari.&lt;/p&gt;
   2234 </a><a href="#h39-0-119" id="h39-0-119" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2235 </a><a href="#h39-0-120" id="h39-0-120" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-ilicet-sata-edax-artesque-submersum-amicitur-ad&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-ilicet-sata-edax-artesque-submersum-amicitur-ad&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Ilicet sata edax artesque submersum amicitur ad&lt;/h2&gt;
   2236 </a><a href="#h39-0-121" id="h39-0-121" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Et &lt;a href=&quot;#misit-aures&quot;&gt;oculis&lt;/a&gt; vadit flavusque. Responsa sceleris ibat nitentem Crenaee mors pendens inquit moriemur artem armos praeter illud, Aloidas olorinis seque et?&lt;/p&gt;
   2237 </a><a href="#h39-0-122" id="h39-0-122" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2238 </a><a href="#h39-0-123" id="h39-0-123" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Territa qui nostro, magis palus erat, hoc &lt;a href=&quot;#coniunx-et&quot;&gt;solem&lt;/a&gt;. Fronti triumphos vinaque; vultusque tollere raptatur Iuppiter, tibi fatalis in modo quotiens minimamque et Minyae. Dantem optabile &lt;em&gt;aurum&lt;/em&gt;; videt est ponit se vultu fervet superi, sub segnior placidique Tremorque. Fictilibus ignis; oris esse cum huius &lt;a href=&quot;#me-eratque&quot;&gt;ultoris&lt;/a&gt;, terrae Delphica.&lt;/p&gt;
   2239 </a><a href="#h39-0-124" id="h39-0-124" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2240 </a><a href="#h39-0-125" id="h39-0-125" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Gravis si nona urbes aggere, tulit &lt;strong&gt;vivat tulit caeleste&lt;/strong&gt; in virgine vidit, diligis. Tibi quid. Illo sua, Palladis, iunctis. Lustrabere regnum Aeneia verba est quo accipis habet Hebe: cum.&lt;/p&gt;
   2241 </a><a href="#h39-0-126" id="h39-0-126" class="d">-
   2242 </a><a href="#h39-0-127" id="h39-0-127" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2243 </a><a href="#h39-0-128" id="h39-0-128" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   2244 </a><a href="#h39-0-129" id="h39-0-129" class="d">-
   2245 </a><a href="#h39-0-130" id="h39-0-130" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;
   2246 </a><a href="#h39-0-131" id="h39-0-131" class="d">-        &lt;footer class=&quot;site-footer&quot;&gt;
   2247 </a><a href="#h39-0-132" id="h39-0-132" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;
   2248 </a><a href="#h39-0-133" id="h39-0-133" class="d">-        &lt;nav class=&quot;site-footer__navigation&quot; aria-label=&quot;Secondary&quot;&gt;
   2249 </a><a href="#h39-0-134" id="h39-0-134" class="d">-            &lt;ul class=&quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&quot;&gt;
   2250 </a><a href="#h39-0-135" id="h39-0-135" class="d">-                
   2251 </a><a href="#h39-0-136" id="h39-0-136" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;
   2252 </a><a href="#h39-0-137" id="h39-0-137" class="d">-                        &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&quot; rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;Build with Eleventy&lt;/a&gt;
   2253 </a><a href="#h39-0-138" id="h39-0-138" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   2254 </a><a href="#h39-0-139" id="h39-0-139" class="d">-                
   2255 </a><a href="#h39-0-140" id="h39-0-140" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;

   2261 </a><a href="#h39-0-146" id="h39-0-146" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   2262 </a><a href="#h39-0-147" id="h39-0-147" class="d">-                
   2263 </a><a href="#h39-0-148" id="h39-0-148" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;

   2265 </a><a href="#h39-0-150" id="h39-0-150" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;

   2267 </a><a href="#h39-0-152" id="h39-0-152" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;

   2269 </a><a href="#h39-0-154" id="h39-0-154" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;

   2347 </a><a href="#h40-0-59" id="h40-0-59" class="d">-        
   2348 </a><a href="#h40-0-60" id="h40-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;

   2351 </a><a href="#h40-0-63" id="h40-0-63" class="d">-
   2352 </a><a href="#h40-0-64" id="h40-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2353 </a><a href="#h40-0-65" id="h40-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;

   2355 </a><a href="#h40-0-67" id="h40-0-67" class="d">-

   2371 </a><a href="#h40-0-83" id="h40-0-83" class="d">-
   2372 </a><a href="#h40-0-84" id="h40-0-84" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   2373 </a><a href="#h40-0-85" id="h40-0-85" class="d">-        
   2374 </a><a href="#h40-0-86" id="h40-0-86" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2375 </a><a href="#h40-0-87" id="h40-0-87" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   2376 </a><a href="#h40-0-88" id="h40-0-88" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2377 </a><a href="#h40-0-89" id="h40-0-89" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   2378 </a><a href="#h40-0-90" id="h40-0-90" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum &lt;strong&gt;verbis&lt;/strong&gt;, fertur &lt;em&gt;fas&lt;/em&gt; poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum &lt;a href=&quot;#murmurat-veros-tepescunt&quot;&gt;illis&lt;/a&gt;, et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.&lt;/p&gt;
   2379 </a><a href="#h40-0-91" id="h40-0-91" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   2380 </a><a href="#h40-0-92" id="h40-0-92" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Addenda ventis non&lt;/li&gt;
   2381 </a><a href="#h40-0-93" id="h40-0-93" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Sol inpia ne arboreis&lt;/li&gt;
   2382 </a><a href="#h40-0-94" id="h40-0-94" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Iam grates voluit cumque&lt;/li&gt;
   2383 </a><a href="#h40-0-95" id="h40-0-95" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Vestigia et clipei adhaeret atque aristas collaque&lt;/li&gt;
   2384 </a><a href="#h40-0-96" id="h40-0-96" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Furialibus Aonius morati optari nullique Hersilie manus&lt;/li&gt;
   2385 </a><a href="#h40-0-97" id="h40-0-97" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   2386 </a><a href="#h40-0-98" id="h40-0-98" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-dispositam-terribilis-quae&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-dispositam-terribilis-quae&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Dispositam terribilis quae&lt;/h2&gt;
   2387 </a><a href="#h40-0-99" id="h40-0-99" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Cognoscite gerens causam circumstant &lt;em&gt;luctus cupioque&lt;/em&gt; morte, fera coniunx frustra Cnosiacaeque, cupidisque tempus Achaia. Pericla multis blanda! Et terribili, nec, &lt;strong&gt;trepidans&lt;/strong&gt; pro; toto nam urbesque.&lt;/p&gt;
   2388 </a><a href="#h40-0-100" id="h40-0-100" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Utilis templum verbis, date Sidonide et fugit, iram vela cultros pennis et nimium. Tuam speciosam truculenta et cinxit sacer feroci et armenta servas; totoque fovet! Diversa ite profugi bella fugit viasque, velint sinu sic Iliades aquas gutture &lt;em&gt;asper&lt;/em&gt; Neptunus.&lt;/p&gt;
   2389 </a><a href="#h40-0-101" id="h40-0-101" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-tu-viginti-non&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-tu-viginti-non&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Tu viginti non&lt;/h2&gt;
   2390 </a><a href="#h40-0-102" id="h40-0-102" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Dedit profundo similis Aurora Luna obscenique; innato amabam scopulos Idan? Ratione fides, nomen, nidos telluris stetit; dextra collumque maenades proxima congreditur! Inquit in dixere noverca manerem; dis omnia meri postquam nostris calidis fraudesque, &lt;strong&gt;imis&lt;/strong&gt;. &lt;strong&gt;Probavit coniunx quoque&lt;/strong&gt;, me mentior geniti fatorum vulnus.&lt;/p&gt;
   2391 </a><a href="#h40-0-103" id="h40-0-103" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   2392 </a><a href="#h40-0-104" id="h40-0-104" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Est et haec bitumine documenta ora at&lt;/li&gt;
   2393 </a><a href="#h40-0-105" id="h40-0-105" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Possent herbas&lt;/li&gt;
   2394 </a><a href="#h40-0-106" id="h40-0-106" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Iacens caelo guttae&lt;/li&gt;
   2395 </a><a href="#h40-0-107" id="h40-0-107" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Unus regni&lt;/li&gt;
   2396 </a><a href="#h40-0-108" id="h40-0-108" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ad aras pueroque nomen&lt;/li&gt;
   2397 </a><a href="#h40-0-109" id="h40-0-109" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   2398 </a><a href="#h40-0-110" id="h40-0-110" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-ut-iugo-quod&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-ut-iugo-quod&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Ut iugo quod&lt;/h2&gt;
   2399 </a><a href="#h40-0-111" id="h40-0-111" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;In Alce ergo vestem Dixit pede non ut &lt;strong&gt;sumit&lt;/strong&gt; exercent. Illi portus; pedes nomine &lt;a href=&quot;#duxerat-fudit&quot;&gt;praeferre rarescit cadit&lt;/a&gt; magni, indignantibus iram herbarum omnibus alter. Et dicere sonum, falsosque vulnera exiliis fugacibus oras accipit templa; sub ora.&lt;/p&gt;
   2400 </a><a href="#h40-0-112" id="h40-0-112" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   2401 </a><a href="#h40-0-113" id="h40-0-113" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Quae equos versus iura leti germanae sibi&lt;/li&gt;
   2402 </a><a href="#h40-0-114" id="h40-0-114" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Vertice innubere velox et postquam fugae credulitate&lt;/li&gt;
   2403 </a><a href="#h40-0-115" id="h40-0-115" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Mihi scelerataque extendi nec istis nostris caput&lt;/li&gt;
   2404 </a><a href="#h40-0-116" id="h40-0-116" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   2405 </a><a href="#h40-0-117" id="h40-0-117" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Tellure liceat sive serpens, erat quamvis, mihi: vultus mihi &lt;a href=&quot;#relicta&quot;&gt;contra frater&lt;/a&gt;. Arce constitit Cimmerios quod, pedes, cetera, totoque dixit misit &lt;a href=&quot;#quae-verba&quot;&gt;adapertaque addidici dabat&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
   2406 </a><a href="#h40-0-118" id="h40-0-118" class="d">-
   2407 </a><a href="#h40-0-119" id="h40-0-119" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2408 </a><a href="#h40-0-120" id="h40-0-120" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   2409 </a><a href="#h40-0-121" id="h40-0-121" class="d">-

   2538 </a><a href="#h41-0-85" id="h41-0-85" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   2539 </a><a href="#h41-0-86" id="h41-0-86" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum ait. Plaustrum gaudet: similis pulsarunt inmortalis multa cui et huic altera nil; non ingenio tormenta visa.&lt;/p&gt;
   2540 </a><a href="#h41-0-87" id="h41-0-87" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2541 </a><a href="#h41-0-88" id="h41-0-88" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Matre quid vescitur Paris hunc rependatur cursus vitasset tenebrae nec! Caelo ad flumina, delapsa tamen corpus hunc nymphae sanguine compos interea excusat iaceres vetitorum, nostro.&lt;/p&gt;
   2542 </a><a href="#h41-0-89" id="h41-0-89" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2543 </a><a href="#h41-0-90" id="h41-0-90" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-cthonius-reque-missa-robore-humus-perque&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-cthonius-reque-missa-robore-humus-perque&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Cthonius reque missa robore humus perque&lt;/h2&gt;
   2544 </a><a href="#h41-0-91" id="h41-0-91" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Nodum praemia nam postes tellus. Iuvenis exstinctum in venire consilium est, pars non eunti &lt;em&gt;texerat&lt;/em&gt; dapibus, satis suarum non mihi licuit carmine. Consulat nec; convexi Apollinei inportuna ipse patitur omnipotens ut ipse!&lt;/p&gt;
   2545 </a><a href="#h41-0-92" id="h41-0-92" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   2546 </a><a href="#h41-0-93" id="h41-0-93" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Veste caelestibus Tyrrhenaque sed&lt;/li&gt;
   2547 </a><a href="#h41-0-94" id="h41-0-94" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Per sacrorum mendacem ut aureus Bromumque haeret&lt;/li&gt;
   2548 </a><a href="#h41-0-95" id="h41-0-95" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Et longe tamen pariterque et toto dabas&lt;/li&gt;
   2549 </a><a href="#h41-0-96" id="h41-0-96" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ore sui cum in iter nocturnos gestamina&lt;/li&gt;
   2550 </a><a href="#h41-0-97" id="h41-0-97" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Annis frementes flammis&lt;/li&gt;
   2551 </a><a href="#h41-0-98" id="h41-0-98" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   2552 </a><a href="#h41-0-99" id="h41-0-99" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-inpositum-inque-de-sagittas-furoris-umet&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-inpositum-inque-de-sagittas-furoris-umet&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Inpositum inque de sagittas furoris umet&lt;/h2&gt;
   2553 </a><a href="#h41-0-100" id="h41-0-100" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Aureus res ille mutata tempora vapor volubile animalia lacrimis cumulum, radiis? Manus figit prius, patrem?&lt;/p&gt;
   2554 </a><a href="#h41-0-101" id="h41-0-101" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   2555 </a><a href="#h41-0-102" id="h41-0-102" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Omni equinis Neptunia habebat&lt;/li&gt;
   2556 </a><a href="#h41-0-103" id="h41-0-103" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Misso hunc notior pars fictus hic opus&lt;/li&gt;
   2557 </a><a href="#h41-0-104" id="h41-0-104" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Quod tuum lenta&lt;/li&gt;
   2558 </a><a href="#h41-0-105" id="h41-0-105" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Manumque illa novit tumulo notam&lt;/li&gt;
   2559 </a><a href="#h41-0-106" id="h41-0-106" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Quid traxere&lt;/li&gt;
   2560 </a><a href="#h41-0-107" id="h41-0-107" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ut tibi prudens temporis liliaque inmanis meas&lt;/li&gt;
   2561 </a><a href="#h41-0-108" id="h41-0-108" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   2562 </a><a href="#h41-0-109" id="h41-0-109" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Pectus dum mendaci duce &lt;a href=&quot;#et-vulnerat&quot;&gt;fama&lt;/a&gt; idem praedae coniunx &lt;strong&gt;obstitit&lt;/strong&gt;, est. Gerit oris manes ferrumque illa, responderat utroque quoque et aera habenti et iterum pugnare; sine, fert. Amplectitur tuam seu tamen utrumque, est quos sub, nec obsuntque, refert exilio supernum carica nunc, carmen.&lt;/p&gt;
   2563 </a><a href="#h41-0-110" id="h41-0-110" class="d">-
   2564 </a><a href="#h41-0-111" id="h41-0-111" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2565 </a><a href="#h41-0-112" id="h41-0-112" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   2566 </a><a href="#h41-0-113" id="h41-0-113" class="d">-
   2567 </a><a href="#h41-0-114" id="h41-0-114" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;

   2575 </a><a href="#h41-0-122" id="h41-0-122" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   2576 </a><a href="#h41-0-123" id="h41-0-123" class="d">-

   2620 </a><a href="#h42-0-10" id="h42-0-10" class="d">-        &lt;/style&gt;
   2621 </a><a href="#h42-0-11" id="h42-0-11" class="d">-
   2622 </a><a href="#h42-0-12" id="h42-0-12" class="d">-        
   2623 </a><a href="#h42-0-13" id="h42-0-13" class="d">-        
   2624 </a><a href="#h42-0-14" id="h42-0-14" class="d">-            
   2625 </a><a href="#h42-0-15" id="h42-0-15" class="d">-                &lt;style&gt;
   2626 </a><a href="#h42-0-16" id="h42-0-16" class="d">-                    .post-list__item{padding-bottom:4rem}.post-list__item__info{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:1rem;color:rgba(248,248,248,.68);gap:1.25rem}.post-list__item__info a{text-decoration-color:#e9a6a6;padding:.2rem .4rem;background-color:#864879;border-radius:10%}.post-list__item__date{padding-bottom:.8rem 0}.post-list__item__excerpt{padding:1.25rem 0}.post-list__link{font-size:2rem;color:#e9a6a6;text-decoration:none;font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:700}.post-list__link:hover{color:#864879}.tags-list{display:flex;justify-content:space-around}.page-content{line-height:1.6;padding-bottom:1.6rem}.page-content blockquote{border-inline-start:1rem solid;padding-inline-start:1.6rem;padding-top:1.6rem;padding-bottom:1.6rem;margin-top:1.6rem;margin-bottom:1.6rem;font-style:italic;border:solid 2px #864879;padding:20px 30px 20px 30px;box-shadow:13px 13px 0 0 #3f3351,15px 15px 0 0 #864879,15px 11px 0 0 #864879,11px 15px 0 0 #864879}.page-content h2{font-size:2rem}.page-content h3{font-size:1.6rem}.page-content li+li{margin-top:.8rem}.page-content h2,.page-content h3{margin-top:.8rem;margin-bottom:.8rem}.page-content h2+*,.page-content h3+*{--flow-space:0.8rem}.page-content p{margin-top:1.25rem;margin-bottom:1.25rem}time[datetime]{display:block;color:#e9a6a6;font-size:2rem;font-style:italic}
   2627 </a><a href="#h42-0-17" id="h42-0-17" class="d">-                &lt;/style&gt;
   2628 </a><a href="#h42-0-18" id="h42-0-18" class="d">-            
   2629 </a><a href="#h42-0-19" id="h42-0-19" class="d">-        
   2630 </a><a href="#h42-0-20" id="h42-0-20" class="d">-
   2631 </a><a href="#h42-0-21" id="h42-0-21" class="d">-        &lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; media=&quot;print&quot; href=&quot;/fonts/fonts.css?88a5-135f-fb46&quot; onload=&quot;this.media=&#39;all&#39;&quot;/&gt;
   2632 </a><a href="#h42-0-22" id="h42-0-22" class="d">-
   2633 </a><a href="#h42-0-23" id="h42-0-23" class="d">-        
   2634 </a><a href="#h42-0-24" id="h42-0-24" class="d">-        
   2635 </a><a href="#h42-0-25" id="h42-0-25" class="d">-
   2636 </a><a href="#h42-0-26" id="h42-0-26" class="d">-    &lt;/head&gt;
   2637 </a><a href="#h42-0-27" id="h42-0-27" class="d">-    &lt;body&gt;

   2639 </a><a href="#h42-0-29" id="h42-0-29" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;
   2640 </a><a href="#h42-0-30" id="h42-0-30" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;site-head__inner&quot;&gt;

   2642 </a><a href="#h42-0-32" id="h42-0-32" class="d">-                &lt;h1&gt;bitbyte&lt;/h1&gt;
   2643 </a><a href="#h42-0-33" id="h42-0-33" class="d">-            &lt;/a&gt;

   2645 </a><a href="#h42-0-35" id="h42-0-35" class="d">-                &lt;ul class=&quot;nav__list&quot;&gt;
   2646 </a><a href="#h42-0-36" id="h42-0-36" class="d">-                    
   2647 </a><a href="#h42-0-37" id="h42-0-37" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;

   2649 </a><a href="#h42-0-39" id="h42-0-39" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   2650 </a><a href="#h42-0-40" id="h42-0-40" class="d">-                    
   2651 </a><a href="#h42-0-41" id="h42-0-41" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;

   2653 </a><a href="#h42-0-43" id="h42-0-43" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;

   2655 </a><a href="#h42-0-45" id="h42-0-45" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;

   2657 </a><a href="#h42-0-47" id="h42-0-47" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;

   2659 </a><a href="#h42-0-49" id="h42-0-49" class="d">-                &lt;/ul&gt;
   2660 </a><a href="#h42-0-50" id="h42-0-50" class="d">-            &lt;/nav&gt;
   2661 </a><a href="#h42-0-51" id="h42-0-51" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2662 </a><a href="#h42-0-52" id="h42-0-52" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2663 </a><a href="#h42-0-53" id="h42-0-53" class="d">-&lt;/header&gt;
   2664 </a><a href="#h42-0-54" id="h42-0-54" class="d">-        &lt;main tabindex=&quot;-1&quot; id=&quot;main-content&quot;&gt;
   2665 </a><a href="#h42-0-55" id="h42-0-55" class="d">-            
   2666 </a><a href="#h42-0-56" id="h42-0-56" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header ]&quot;&gt;
   2667 </a><a href="#h42-0-57" id="h42-0-57" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&quot;&gt;
   2668 </a><a href="#h42-0-58" id="h42-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;Design Thinking &amp;amp; Understanding the Product Design Process&lt;/h1&gt;
   2669 </a><a href="#h42-0-59" id="h42-0-59" class="d">-        
   2670 </a><a href="#h42-0-60" id="h42-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   2671 </a><a href="#h42-0-61" id="h42-0-61" class="d">-                
   2672 </a><a href="#h42-0-62" id="h42-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Feb 21, 2020&quot;&gt;Feb 21, 2020&lt;/time&gt;
   2673 </a><a href="#h42-0-63" id="h42-0-63" class="d">-
   2674 </a><a href="#h42-0-64" id="h42-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2675 </a><a href="#h42-0-65" id="h42-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   2676 </a><a href="#h42-0-66" id="h42-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   2677 </a><a href="#h42-0-67" id="h42-0-67" class="d">-            
   2678 </a><a href="#h42-0-68" id="h42-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   2679 </a><a href="#h42-0-69" id="h42-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/design-thinking/&quot;&gt;#DesignThinking&lt;/a&gt;
   2680 </a><a href="#h42-0-70" id="h42-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   2681 </a><a href="#h42-0-71" id="h42-0-71" class="d">-            
   2682 </a><a href="#h42-0-72" id="h42-0-72" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   2683 </a><a href="#h42-0-73" id="h42-0-73" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2684 </a><a href="#h42-0-74" id="h42-0-74" class="d">-
   2685 </a><a href="#h42-0-75" id="h42-0-75" class="d">-
   2686 </a><a href="#h42-0-76" id="h42-0-76" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   2687 </a><a href="#h42-0-77" id="h42-0-77" class="d">-        
   2688 </a><a href="#h42-0-78" id="h42-0-78" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2689 </a><a href="#h42-0-79" id="h42-0-79" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   2690 </a><a href="#h42-0-80" id="h42-0-80" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2691 </a><a href="#h42-0-81" id="h42-0-81" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   2692 </a><a href="#h42-0-82" id="h42-0-82" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum purpura dolorem! Paterque gentis nam &lt;strong&gt;consilii&lt;/strong&gt; temptanti comitum epulae hic iuvene inducta cava talia solebat iussit.&lt;/p&gt;
   2693 </a><a href="#h42-0-83" id="h42-0-83" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2694 </a><a href="#h42-0-84" id="h42-0-84" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Natasque iacebat curvantem me iactat atque: non deus si omnia Buten inquit confinia ausa repertum virum. In iniusta libertas inposuitque probant, &lt;em&gt;ut iubasque&lt;/em&gt; dignus aethera vale mitem tecumque insidias concita, quis modo egentes. Pico peregit nunc; quia litore pronos iuvenalia verteris partique solvi, tres et! Enim sumus viriles concepit ementitus ullis sublime ferentes ferro Troada posse expersque terris.&lt;/p&gt;
   2695 </a><a href="#h42-0-85" id="h42-0-85" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2696 </a><a href="#h42-0-86" id="h42-0-86" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-non-est-fieri-vani-dentemque-thracum&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-non-est-fieri-vani-dentemque-thracum&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Non est fieri vani dentemque Thracum&lt;/h2&gt;
   2697 </a><a href="#h42-0-87" id="h42-0-87" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Teneraque Peneidas nisi Isthmo, curru erat Argos dryades, ait fila. Et absumptis omnemque. Cum altum iubebat Acrota fuerat nec telisque hactenus. Ire sinus oblatae pennas, et vidit se &lt;em&gt;est numen&lt;/em&gt;! Fictilibus comparat cutis.&lt;/p&gt;
   2698 </a><a href="#h42-0-88" id="h42-0-88" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Est me imagine &lt;a href=&quot;#est-nurus-nitidaeque&quot;&gt;intrare dimittere&lt;/a&gt;, cremet, totosque utero. Vestros pudorem.&lt;/p&gt;
   2699 </a><a href="#h42-0-89" id="h42-0-89" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-extis-iactanti-indicat-profuit&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-extis-iactanti-indicat-profuit&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Extis iactanti indicat profuit&lt;/h2&gt;
   2700 </a><a href="#h42-0-90" id="h42-0-90" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Praebentem curis, omnibus neque admissa fortissime ipse potuit ne spes Cyllenius. Suscipitur ita dictu serva Cancri, illac sanguine fabula matrem Onetor, pro maestis voces mandata dumque &lt;strong&gt;Camenae&lt;/strong&gt;. Roratis fluidos ubi sit stupuit rupit tura nec &lt;a href=&quot;#ales-est-easdem&quot;&gt;me&lt;/a&gt; regia: &lt;a href=&quot;#miserande-palmas-positoris&quot;&gt;ubi&lt;/a&gt; tum &lt;a href=&quot;#medea&quot;&gt;cepit&lt;/a&gt; contra modumque refert caeruleusque minax.&lt;/p&gt;
   2701 </a><a href="#h42-0-91" id="h42-0-91" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2702 </a><a href="#h42-0-92" id="h42-0-92" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Eburno Phoebi nec mille fluctus tinguitur &lt;em&gt;quaque&lt;/em&gt; terris intra &lt;strong&gt;et sceleri vocamus&lt;/strong&gt; gravis ante, est! Aloidas quis vincite pectora puer, ducens. Sine urbes: quem vati subducere artis quisquis, legit nuper, erat quos. Quae vultus hic triplex, lumina et bina &lt;em&gt;femina pectore&lt;/em&gt;, suco ducit ventis parentem Abanteis. Abarin inmeritas et reddunt; phaethon inroravit arcanis vates; laboris.&lt;/p&gt;
   2703 </a><a href="#h42-0-93" id="h42-0-93" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2704 </a><a href="#h42-0-94" id="h42-0-94" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-cladis-abeunt-bimari-per-ad-hanc&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-cladis-abeunt-bimari-per-ad-hanc&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Cladis abeunt bimari per ad hanc&lt;/h2&gt;
   2705 </a><a href="#h42-0-95" id="h42-0-95" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Cava metum iam pinum, aequora auferat memorant aut versat forsitan Phoebe! Mutastis apparuit novit aegre cognati est, in nostri ratibus Pergama partes campoque.&lt;/p&gt;
   2706 </a><a href="#h42-0-96" id="h42-0-96" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   2707 </a><a href="#h42-0-97" id="h42-0-97" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Saepe scire cauda&lt;/li&gt;
   2708 </a><a href="#h42-0-98" id="h42-0-98" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Pergus nunc inde iamque secura seriemque viso&lt;/li&gt;
   2709 </a><a href="#h42-0-99" id="h42-0-99" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ibat Tempe locum ostia lacrimarum fraudem illa&lt;/li&gt;
   2710 </a><a href="#h42-0-100" id="h42-0-100" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Acutis carpitur et restat volvitur radiis deus&lt;/li&gt;
   2711 </a><a href="#h42-0-101" id="h42-0-101" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Aloidas tenues&lt;/li&gt;
   2712 </a><a href="#h42-0-102" id="h42-0-102" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Etiamnum in amans vinctus quo ratis profecti&lt;/li&gt;
   2713 </a><a href="#h42-0-103" id="h42-0-103" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   2714 </a><a href="#h42-0-104" id="h42-0-104" class="d">-
   2715 </a><a href="#h42-0-105" id="h42-0-105" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2716 </a><a href="#h42-0-106" id="h42-0-106" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   2717 </a><a href="#h42-0-107" id="h42-0-107" class="d">-
   2718 </a><a href="#h42-0-108" id="h42-0-108" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;

   2791 </a><a href="#h43-0-30" id="h43-0-30" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;site-head__inner&quot;&gt;
   2792 </a><a href="#h43-0-31" id="h43-0-31" class="d">-            &lt;a href=&quot;/&quot; aria-label=&quot;bitbyte - home&quot; class=&quot;site-head__brand&quot;&gt;
   2793 </a><a href="#h43-0-32" id="h43-0-32" class="d">-                &lt;h1&gt;bitbyte&lt;/h1&gt;
   2794 </a><a href="#h43-0-33" id="h43-0-33" class="d">-            &lt;/a&gt;
   2795 </a><a href="#h43-0-34" id="h43-0-34" class="d">-            &lt;nav class=&quot;[ nav ] [ site-head__nav ]&quot; aria-label=&quot;Primary&quot;&gt;
   2796 </a><a href="#h43-0-35" id="h43-0-35" class="d">-                &lt;ul class=&quot;nav__list&quot;&gt;
   2797 </a><a href="#h43-0-36" id="h43-0-36" class="d">-                    
   2798 </a><a href="#h43-0-37" id="h43-0-37" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   2799 </a><a href="#h43-0-38" id="h43-0-38" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/&quot; &gt;home&lt;/a&gt;
   2800 </a><a href="#h43-0-39" id="h43-0-39" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   2801 </a><a href="#h43-0-40" id="h43-0-40" class="d">-                    
   2802 </a><a href="#h43-0-41" id="h43-0-41" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   2803 </a><a href="#h43-0-42" id="h43-0-42" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/blog/&quot; &gt;blog&lt;/a&gt;
   2804 </a><a href="#h43-0-43" id="h43-0-43" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   2805 </a><a href="#h43-0-44" id="h43-0-44" class="d">-                    
   2806 </a><a href="#h43-0-45" id="h43-0-45" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   2807 </a><a href="#h43-0-46" id="h43-0-46" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/about/&quot; &gt;about&lt;/a&gt;
   2808 </a><a href="#h43-0-47" id="h43-0-47" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   2809 </a><a href="#h43-0-48" id="h43-0-48" class="d">-                    
   2810 </a><a href="#h43-0-49" id="h43-0-49" class="d">-                &lt;/ul&gt;
   2811 </a><a href="#h43-0-50" id="h43-0-50" class="d">-            &lt;/nav&gt;
   2812 </a><a href="#h43-0-51" id="h43-0-51" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2813 </a><a href="#h43-0-52" id="h43-0-52" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2814 </a><a href="#h43-0-53" id="h43-0-53" class="d">-&lt;/header&gt;
   2815 </a><a href="#h43-0-54" id="h43-0-54" class="d">-        &lt;main tabindex=&quot;-1&quot; id=&quot;main-content&quot;&gt;
   2816 </a><a href="#h43-0-55" id="h43-0-55" class="d">-            
   2817 </a><a href="#h43-0-56" id="h43-0-56" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header ]&quot;&gt;
   2818 </a><a href="#h43-0-57" id="h43-0-57" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&quot;&gt;
   2819 </a><a href="#h43-0-58" id="h43-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;How to create a remote usability test for fast, actionable insights&lt;/h1&gt;
   2820 </a><a href="#h43-0-59" id="h43-0-59" class="d">-        
   2821 </a><a href="#h43-0-60" id="h43-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   2822 </a><a href="#h43-0-61" id="h43-0-61" class="d">-                
   2823 </a><a href="#h43-0-62" id="h43-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Feb 2, 2020&quot;&gt;Feb 2, 2020&lt;/time&gt;
   2824 </a><a href="#h43-0-63" id="h43-0-63" class="d">-
   2825 </a><a href="#h43-0-64" id="h43-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2826 </a><a href="#h43-0-65" id="h43-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   2827 </a><a href="#h43-0-66" id="h43-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   2828 </a><a href="#h43-0-67" id="h43-0-67" class="d">-            
   2829 </a><a href="#h43-0-68" id="h43-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   2830 </a><a href="#h43-0-69" id="h43-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/ux/&quot;&gt;#Ux&lt;/a&gt;
   2831 </a><a href="#h43-0-70" id="h43-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   2832 </a><a href="#h43-0-71" id="h43-0-71" class="d">-            
   2833 </a><a href="#h43-0-72" id="h43-0-72" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   2834 </a><a href="#h43-0-73" id="h43-0-73" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/testing/&quot;&gt;#Testing&lt;/a&gt;
   2835 </a><a href="#h43-0-74" id="h43-0-74" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   2836 </a><a href="#h43-0-75" id="h43-0-75" class="d">-            
   2837 </a><a href="#h43-0-76" id="h43-0-76" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   2838 </a><a href="#h43-0-77" id="h43-0-77" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2839 </a><a href="#h43-0-78" id="h43-0-78" class="d">-
   2840 </a><a href="#h43-0-79" id="h43-0-79" class="d">-
   2841 </a><a href="#h43-0-80" id="h43-0-80" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   2842 </a><a href="#h43-0-81" id="h43-0-81" class="d">-        
   2843 </a><a href="#h43-0-82" id="h43-0-82" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2844 </a><a href="#h43-0-83" id="h43-0-83" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   2845 </a><a href="#h43-0-84" id="h43-0-84" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2846 </a><a href="#h43-0-85" id="h43-0-85" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   2847 </a><a href="#h43-0-86" id="h43-0-86" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum tecta: sub candore removete cessit summum &lt;a href=&quot;#adigitque-qua&quot;&gt;laetitiae&lt;/a&gt;? Per et est micantia nisi fato? Inde cura velamina tamen deme nititur ubere: una sidera fruticosa primus demissam transire in muneris. Inter est repugnat &lt;a href=&quot;#medio-sine-quamvis&quot;&gt;dempta&lt;/a&gt;, sinu, quisque.&lt;/p&gt;
   2848 </a><a href="#h43-0-87" id="h43-0-87" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2849 </a><a href="#h43-0-88" id="h43-0-88" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Huic e hunc flamina in eripuit vittisconcutiens et Phylius fulmineo. Medium cursu Acastus nolim &lt;strong&gt;auditas se&lt;/strong&gt; videntur undis et Ulixes et tanto coruscis luctibus perdidit iam undique Medea finiat. Labare marmoris; in arte inpressa, tacuit, Argosque! Et quodsi arma, et &lt;strong&gt;verba&lt;/strong&gt;, dominoque colla prece, &lt;a href=&quot;#mittunt&quot;&gt;Hippodamen ab&lt;/a&gt; viderit cruor rugosoque terra omnipotens.&lt;/p&gt;
   2850 </a><a href="#h43-0-89" id="h43-0-89" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2851 </a><a href="#h43-0-90" id="h43-0-90" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-crudelia-qua-arida-quae-ducum&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-crudelia-qua-arida-quae-ducum&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Crudelia qua arida quae ducum&lt;/h2&gt;
   2852 </a><a href="#h43-0-91" id="h43-0-91" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Tirynthia sacras. Sed urbes; est et adamante tegens, dea data &lt;a href=&quot;#nullam-persea-conplexa&quot;&gt;nebulas&lt;/a&gt; buxoque, mansura pars, corpore! Currere iacent curaeque addidit &lt;a href=&quot;#vetitum-nostris-vultus&quot;&gt;qui&lt;/a&gt; Tydidae aeris. Ignotas se &lt;em&gt;matris timido aquae&lt;/em&gt;: pedis alis circum lilia flumine, et fecit mei minores tantum. Funera caput.&lt;/p&gt;
   2853 </a><a href="#h43-0-92" id="h43-0-92" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2854 </a><a href="#h43-0-93" id="h43-0-93" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Parens parte mora: caput copia, &lt;a href=&quot;#aptumque-hypsea-est&quot;&gt;senes quae cervix&lt;/a&gt; Troum tenent, rectior. Foret sanguine lilia. Aut arvo repetita palmas.&lt;/p&gt;
   2855 </a><a href="#h43-0-94" id="h43-0-94" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2856 </a><a href="#h43-0-95" id="h43-0-95" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-quae-ideoque&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-quae-ideoque&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Quae ideoque&lt;/h2&gt;
   2857 </a><a href="#h43-0-96" id="h43-0-96" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Antri fervoribus fulvae: adest modo veretur in pignus essem, &lt;a href=&quot;#tendat-illis-sed&quot;&gt;auro&lt;/a&gt; et Orphea filia, demens, regnorum, aut. Nivea est ubi peragit, usus utere Talia permanet, omnes.&lt;/p&gt;
   2858 </a><a href="#h43-0-97" id="h43-0-97" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2859 </a><a href="#h43-0-98" id="h43-0-98" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Iaculum si tenues vivit fuit, ille quoque proceres summisque, quaerere. Utque dixit harpen astra antiquas; deus nondum et successu.&lt;/p&gt;
   2860 </a><a href="#h43-0-99" id="h43-0-99" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2861 </a><a href="#h43-0-100" id="h43-0-100" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;In se silvis sulphure &lt;strong&gt;caecisque navita relanguit&lt;/strong&gt;, auxilium vulnus levem, superesse orbem Iapetionides. In trahit undas concilium urbe Aiax foedus pavit sonum probatum nunc timentem bene!&lt;/p&gt;
   2862 </a><a href="#h43-0-101" id="h43-0-101" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum quicumque illa. Licuit saetae in pedem moles &lt;strong&gt;clamare etiam&lt;/strong&gt;. Sunt ligati genu Oetaeis fines non addit, &lt;em&gt;sub silvestribus stabula&lt;/em&gt; servat; et pelago in reticere. Iphi tristis egit vatum Priamum cuncta, tu sive liquidas, est cum &lt;a href=&quot;#manu-accessit-verbis&quot;&gt;paciscitur tamen&lt;/a&gt;. Fata post voles sparsosque ducat pedibusque nobilitas diem miseroque natum corrigit hanc in quem tuum quos in.&lt;/p&gt;
   2863 </a><a href="#h43-0-102" id="h43-0-102" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   2864 </a><a href="#h43-0-103" id="h43-0-103" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Vires&lt;/em&gt; illo sum, nec, nunc, ademi silvas occubuit magnanimus umore, sit alimenta quam, lateque. Illa excipit: bos platanus mihi, est lacessas cum, quid Iuno ter frondentis te convexa iuvenes nobis rates. Fruges magna, inflataque tale attonitae acies.&lt;/p&gt;
   2865 </a><a href="#h43-0-104" id="h43-0-104" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   2866 </a><a href="#h43-0-105" id="h43-0-105" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-ac-fretaque-rapitur-pluma-numine-aris&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-ac-fretaque-rapitur-pluma-numine-aris&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Ac fretaque rapitur pluma numine aris&lt;/h2&gt;
   2867 </a><a href="#h43-0-106" id="h43-0-106" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Arreptamque&lt;/strong&gt; dixit faciendus ex somnis damnavit nocens ut picae. Uno &lt;strong&gt;paternum&lt;/strong&gt; dicta furtisque noctem hoste in Bybli dilectus. Est angue noverat: coniunx et disque tuentes tenes raptaque praeside. Ducit vos ego Italiae nimbis miserae &lt;strong&gt;superos&lt;/strong&gt; praeterque, certa per. Quae bene atque sequitur crimen inter tollere.&lt;/p&gt;
   2868 </a><a href="#h43-0-107" id="h43-0-107" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   2869 </a><a href="#h43-0-108" id="h43-0-108" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Crudelia properas praeterita prima est mei lumina&lt;/li&gt;
   2870 </a><a href="#h43-0-109" id="h43-0-109" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Onus per serpens celant&lt;/li&gt;
   2871 </a><a href="#h43-0-110" id="h43-0-110" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Generisque rarior est sperat&lt;/li&gt;
   2872 </a><a href="#h43-0-111" id="h43-0-111" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Tum signa tegebant perire militia nivibus exacta&lt;/li&gt;
   2873 </a><a href="#h43-0-112" id="h43-0-112" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   2874 </a><a href="#h43-0-113" id="h43-0-113" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-lacrimare-volentem&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-lacrimare-volentem&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Lacrimare volentem&lt;/h2&gt;
   2875 </a><a href="#h43-0-114" id="h43-0-114" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Cursus plenum? Usus rura timidis.&lt;/p&gt;
   2876 </a><a href="#h43-0-115" id="h43-0-115" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   2877 </a><a href="#h43-0-116" id="h43-0-116" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Est sed ignotis texit insequitur cerebro summae&lt;/li&gt;
   2878 </a><a href="#h43-0-117" id="h43-0-117" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;In et auras sanguine Maeonia&lt;/li&gt;
   2879 </a><a href="#h43-0-118" id="h43-0-118" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Medium ait dederant ferunt munus&lt;/li&gt;
   2880 </a><a href="#h43-0-119" id="h43-0-119" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Tamen mutor tu esse ambiguis Auram&lt;/li&gt;
   2881 </a><a href="#h43-0-120" id="h43-0-120" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   2882 </a><a href="#h43-0-121" id="h43-0-121" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-exit-fortes-bibendo-ferre-nemus-spe-velociter&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-exit-fortes-bibendo-ferre-nemus-spe-velociter&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Exit fortes bibendo ferre nemus spe velociter&lt;/h2&gt;
   2883 </a><a href="#h43-0-122" id="h43-0-122" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Frustra aera verum lusuque &lt;a href=&quot;#ora-meos-in&quot;&gt;inquit nata&lt;/a&gt; mixtum arva Glaucus vitiataque &lt;em&gt;exaestuat ruborem&lt;/em&gt;. Ergo refugitque nocti tingui si corpus factis maius in vipereos stratis servant aut quae viribus circum, victi.&lt;/p&gt;
   2884 </a><a href="#h43-0-123" id="h43-0-123" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Deos tulit Cephison nequiquam luctus tellus: ora iacet aequoris viri gurgite cumulum ad ignibus &lt;em&gt;neque&lt;/em&gt;. Hectoris posse: vinclis stupet! Putat tuorum; ramos, lotos populi demptis tenues hic time procorum domo?&lt;/p&gt;
   2885 </a><a href="#h43-0-124" id="h43-0-124" class="d">-
   2886 </a><a href="#h43-0-125" id="h43-0-125" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2887 </a><a href="#h43-0-126" id="h43-0-126" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   2888 </a><a href="#h43-0-127" id="h43-0-127" class="d">-
   2889 </a><a href="#h43-0-128" id="h43-0-128" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;
   2890 </a><a href="#h43-0-129" id="h43-0-129" class="d">-        &lt;footer class=&quot;site-footer&quot;&gt;

   2897 </a><a href="#h43-0-136" id="h43-0-136" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;

   2913 </a><a href="#h43-0-152" id="h43-0-152" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;

   2926 </a><a href="#h43-0-165" id="h43-0-165" class="d">-&lt;/footer&gt;

   2960 </a><a href="#h44-0-28" id="h44-0-28" class="d">-        &lt;header role=&quot;banner&quot; class=&quot;site-head&quot;&gt;
   2961 </a><a href="#h44-0-29" id="h44-0-29" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;
   2962 </a><a href="#h44-0-30" id="h44-0-30" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;site-head__inner&quot;&gt;
   2963 </a><a href="#h44-0-31" id="h44-0-31" class="d">-            &lt;a href=&quot;/&quot; aria-label=&quot;bitbyte - home&quot; class=&quot;site-head__brand&quot;&gt;
   2964 </a><a href="#h44-0-32" id="h44-0-32" class="d">-                &lt;h1&gt;bitbyte&lt;/h1&gt;
   2965 </a><a href="#h44-0-33" id="h44-0-33" class="d">-            &lt;/a&gt;
   2966 </a><a href="#h44-0-34" id="h44-0-34" class="d">-            &lt;nav class=&quot;[ nav ] [ site-head__nav ]&quot; aria-label=&quot;Primary&quot;&gt;
   2967 </a><a href="#h44-0-35" id="h44-0-35" class="d">-                &lt;ul class=&quot;nav__list&quot;&gt;
   2968 </a><a href="#h44-0-36" id="h44-0-36" class="d">-                    
   2969 </a><a href="#h44-0-37" id="h44-0-37" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   2970 </a><a href="#h44-0-38" id="h44-0-38" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/&quot; &gt;home&lt;/a&gt;
   2971 </a><a href="#h44-0-39" id="h44-0-39" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   2972 </a><a href="#h44-0-40" id="h44-0-40" class="d">-                    
   2973 </a><a href="#h44-0-41" id="h44-0-41" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   2974 </a><a href="#h44-0-42" id="h44-0-42" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/blog/&quot; &gt;blog&lt;/a&gt;
   2975 </a><a href="#h44-0-43" id="h44-0-43" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   2976 </a><a href="#h44-0-44" id="h44-0-44" class="d">-                    
   2977 </a><a href="#h44-0-45" id="h44-0-45" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   2978 </a><a href="#h44-0-46" id="h44-0-46" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/about/&quot; &gt;about&lt;/a&gt;
   2979 </a><a href="#h44-0-47" id="h44-0-47" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   2980 </a><a href="#h44-0-48" id="h44-0-48" class="d">-                    
   2981 </a><a href="#h44-0-49" id="h44-0-49" class="d">-                &lt;/ul&gt;
   2982 </a><a href="#h44-0-50" id="h44-0-50" class="d">-            &lt;/nav&gt;
   2983 </a><a href="#h44-0-51" id="h44-0-51" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   2984 </a><a href="#h44-0-52" id="h44-0-52" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   2985 </a><a href="#h44-0-53" id="h44-0-53" class="d">-&lt;/header&gt;
   2986 </a><a href="#h44-0-54" id="h44-0-54" class="d">-        &lt;main tabindex=&quot;-1&quot; id=&quot;main-content&quot;&gt;
   2987 </a><a href="#h44-0-55" id="h44-0-55" class="d">-            
   2988 </a><a href="#h44-0-56" id="h44-0-56" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header ]&quot;&gt;
   2989 </a><a href="#h44-0-57" id="h44-0-57" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&quot;&gt;
   2990 </a><a href="#h44-0-58" id="h44-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;How to test usability of websites remotely&lt;/h1&gt;
   2991 </a><a href="#h44-0-59" id="h44-0-59" class="d">-        
   2992 </a><a href="#h44-0-60" id="h44-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   2993 </a><a href="#h44-0-61" id="h44-0-61" class="d">-                
   2994 </a><a href="#h44-0-62" id="h44-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Dec 2, 2019&quot;&gt;Dec 2, 2019&lt;/time&gt;
   2995 </a><a href="#h44-0-63" id="h44-0-63" class="d">-
   2996 </a><a href="#h44-0-64" id="h44-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   2997 </a><a href="#h44-0-65" id="h44-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   2998 </a><a href="#h44-0-66" id="h44-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   2999 </a><a href="#h44-0-67" id="h44-0-67" class="d">-            
   3000 </a><a href="#h44-0-68" id="h44-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3001 </a><a href="#h44-0-69" id="h44-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/ux/&quot;&gt;#Ux&lt;/a&gt;
   3002 </a><a href="#h44-0-70" id="h44-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   3003 </a><a href="#h44-0-71" id="h44-0-71" class="d">-            
   3004 </a><a href="#h44-0-72" id="h44-0-72" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3005 </a><a href="#h44-0-73" id="h44-0-73" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/testing/&quot;&gt;#Testing&lt;/a&gt;
   3006 </a><a href="#h44-0-74" id="h44-0-74" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   3007 </a><a href="#h44-0-75" id="h44-0-75" class="d">-            
   3008 </a><a href="#h44-0-76" id="h44-0-76" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   3009 </a><a href="#h44-0-77" id="h44-0-77" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3010 </a><a href="#h44-0-78" id="h44-0-78" class="d">-
   3011 </a><a href="#h44-0-79" id="h44-0-79" class="d">-
   3012 </a><a href="#h44-0-80" id="h44-0-80" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   3013 </a><a href="#h44-0-81" id="h44-0-81" class="d">-        
   3014 </a><a href="#h44-0-82" id="h44-0-82" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3015 </a><a href="#h44-0-83" id="h44-0-83" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   3016 </a><a href="#h44-0-84" id="h44-0-84" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3017 </a><a href="#h44-0-85" id="h44-0-85" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   3018 </a><a href="#h44-0-86" id="h44-0-86" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum et quaeque nunc cum &lt;em&gt;Atlantiades&lt;/em&gt; versis, valuit meos tumescere fateri in circa. Ipso colla multum volentem, in viro neve, semineces ac erat carmine manus. &lt;em&gt;Per&lt;/em&gt; amat aut &lt;strong&gt;Thracesque semina&lt;/strong&gt; meritus lacrimas scinditur et pro enim summis, probat gravi mare. Cuspide sustulit, secutis alte, muta tibi me o torum. Probavit tegitur meritum, Pythia subscribi, miscuerat fallax, hoc mille.&lt;/p&gt;
   3019 </a><a href="#h44-0-87" id="h44-0-87" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   3020 </a><a href="#h44-0-88" id="h44-0-88" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Cthonius toto ignara excussit dixit ora dentes loquatur hi tractus maius, alto. Suae nomine tellus, conparentis bene Phaethon bene Iphis quisquis cretum eram quoque nec haec fugiunt trepidans in torvo. Columbae extrema occupat huic, precari enim rupem equos his fama. Deerit hunc paludosa ex sine non quamquam veram simul, quid, vipereis aures intabescere maior corpus, imas.&lt;/p&gt;
   3021 </a><a href="#h44-0-89" id="h44-0-89" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   3022 </a><a href="#h44-0-90" id="h44-0-90" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Corpora est, ad dixit auctoris tumulavit in &lt;strong&gt;fateor&lt;/strong&gt; versarunt latet: gladiis undamque Medusae: sunt videt hic. Annum penetralia usque maior esse &lt;em&gt;Cyllare&lt;/em&gt; medii precanda ab est montis ne, deae Oeten se uterum ad pressaeque patrii. Et putat nulla, iam umeris indotata signaque rerum unius medicamina quam ripa annum lecturum ut torum magicaeque Phrygios? Victus arma, malo curas temptabimus illi oborto undis pharetra! Caelo risi cecidere quo ferrum: solis tacitus patrii, in lato.&lt;/p&gt;
   3023 </a><a href="#h44-0-91" id="h44-0-91" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-quae-sedes-percussit&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-quae-sedes-percussit&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Quae sedes percussit&lt;/h2&gt;
   3024 </a><a href="#h44-0-92" id="h44-0-92" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Mihi sed Talibus est addere negetur, poscis facis, subvolat, uno detraxit post: me aurata, egreditur. &lt;strong&gt;Se moenia quosque&lt;/strong&gt; commune: ait sive. Sit non per voce vinctus, ut frondes hanc avido &lt;a href=&quot;#suo-atque&quot;&gt;si naturae saucius&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
   3025 </a><a href="#h44-0-93" id="h44-0-93" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   3026 </a><a href="#h44-0-94" id="h44-0-94" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Sequenti albet; iram nisi ima &lt;em&gt;montis sanguine parmam&lt;/em&gt; quinquennem. Illo haut, deus est percurrere gaudia meruisse pia simul; ire. Imminet errore pestifero Amphissos uterum annua protinus Menephron vultus avium ortus, serpit opus: non. Eueni meis cauda coluique &lt;strong&gt;molarem mitissima&lt;/strong&gt;; ramos exit illa salutem ensis ille quam pontum.&lt;/p&gt;
   3027 </a><a href="#h44-0-95" id="h44-0-95" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   3028 </a><a href="#h44-0-96" id="h44-0-96" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-ferre-incipit-melanthus-exiguo&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-ferre-incipit-melanthus-exiguo&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Ferre incipit Melanthus exiguo&lt;/h2&gt;
   3029 </a><a href="#h44-0-97" id="h44-0-97" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Versus deinde pectoraque arcana glandiferam passu, et placet cuncti nitido adfectu loca erat Tusci, vidistis. &lt;strong&gt;Cum oculis carinas&lt;/strong&gt; simul fatum quaterque anxia paverunt tegat, repulsam &lt;strong&gt;et invicti fundebat&lt;/strong&gt; et pavit a seges &lt;a href=&quot;#reliquerat&quot;&gt;per patris&lt;/a&gt;. Lacrimae rubescunt et tenus superare adspicis flammis illi usu lacrimae procul ei frustra Hectoris annis exstructas campos inhaesit pectore movit. Ipse nuper densis aevo anguem, vides apta aquis, creditur. Es &lt;em&gt;tulit&lt;/em&gt; culpa, cruore arma ore premunt apte, sua!&lt;/p&gt;
   3030 </a><a href="#h44-0-98" id="h44-0-98" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   3031 </a><a href="#h44-0-99" id="h44-0-99" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Alto operum concolor Daedalus. Sit ipse contrarius tibi bracchia saecula et comas uritur, divino ut percussamque et &lt;strong&gt;Dianae&lt;/strong&gt;, lacrimaeque. Tuos stellarum Ithacus sub, et rutilis torrentur staret pietas laborant sagittae contraria sorores. Matre ipsa nostro cum omnes unde virga seque barbam functa de habebat ictae, et metuens.&lt;/p&gt;
   3032 </a><a href="#h44-0-100" id="h44-0-100" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   3033 </a><a href="#h44-0-101" id="h44-0-101" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Non matrem mactatae se multa odium ipsa, ubi cremabo, Solis ferro Asbolus in. Nox fodientibus suo inplent ebur, Qui tamen nec movit, et ruit Hypanis ereptus postes attenuatus.&lt;/p&gt;
   3034 </a><a href="#h44-0-102" id="h44-0-102" class="d">-
   3035 </a><a href="#h44-0-103" id="h44-0-103" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3036 </a><a href="#h44-0-104" id="h44-0-104" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   3037 </a><a href="#h44-0-105" id="h44-0-105" class="d">-
   3038 </a><a href="#h44-0-106" id="h44-0-106" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;

   3081 </a><a href="#h45-0-0" id="h45-0-0" class="d">-
   3082 </a><a href="#h45-0-1" id="h45-0-1" class="d">-&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;
   3083 </a><a href="#h45-0-2" id="h45-0-2" class="d">-&lt;html lang=&quot;en&quot;&gt;
   3084 </a><a href="#h45-0-3" id="h45-0-3" class="d">-    &lt;head&gt;
   3085 </a><a href="#h45-0-4" id="h45-0-4" class="d">-        &lt;meta charset=&quot;UTF-8&quot;&gt;
   3086 </a><a href="#h45-0-5" id="h45-0-5" class="d">-        &lt;meta http-equiv=&quot;X-UA-Compatible&quot; content=&quot;IE=edge&quot;&gt;
   3087 </a><a href="#h45-0-6" id="h45-0-6" class="d">-        &lt;meta name=&quot;viewport&quot; content=&quot;width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0&quot;&gt;
   3088 </a><a href="#h45-0-7" id="h45-0-7" class="d">-        &lt;title&gt;Laws of UX&lt;/title&gt;
   3089 </a><a href="#h45-0-8" id="h45-0-8" class="d">-        &lt;style&gt;
   3090 </a><a href="#h45-0-9" id="h45-0-9" class="d">-            @charset
