   3126 </a><a href="#h45-0-45" id="h45-0-45" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   3127 </a><a href="#h45-0-46" id="h45-0-46" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/about/&quot; &gt;about&lt;/a&gt;
   3128 </a><a href="#h45-0-47" id="h45-0-47" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   3129 </a><a href="#h45-0-48" id="h45-0-48" class="d">-                    
   3130 </a><a href="#h45-0-49" id="h45-0-49" class="d">-                &lt;/ul&gt;
   3131 </a><a href="#h45-0-50" id="h45-0-50" class="d">-            &lt;/nav&gt;
   3132 </a><a href="#h45-0-51" id="h45-0-51" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3133 </a><a href="#h45-0-52" id="h45-0-52" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3134 </a><a href="#h45-0-53" id="h45-0-53" class="d">-&lt;/header&gt;
   3135 </a><a href="#h45-0-54" id="h45-0-54" class="d">-        &lt;main tabindex=&quot;-1&quot; id=&quot;main-content&quot;&gt;
   3136 </a><a href="#h45-0-55" id="h45-0-55" class="d">-            
   3137 </a><a href="#h45-0-56" id="h45-0-56" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header ]&quot;&gt;
   3138 </a><a href="#h45-0-57" id="h45-0-57" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&quot;&gt;
   3139 </a><a href="#h45-0-58" id="h45-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;Laws of UX&lt;/h1&gt;
   3140 </a><a href="#h45-0-59" id="h45-0-59" class="d">-        
   3141 </a><a href="#h45-0-60" id="h45-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   3142 </a><a href="#h45-0-61" id="h45-0-61" class="d">-                
   3143 </a><a href="#h45-0-62" id="h45-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Mar 22, 2020&quot;&gt;Mar 22, 2020&lt;/time&gt;
   3144 </a><a href="#h45-0-63" id="h45-0-63" class="d">-
   3145 </a><a href="#h45-0-64" id="h45-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3146 </a><a href="#h45-0-65" id="h45-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   3147 </a><a href="#h45-0-66" id="h45-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   3148 </a><a href="#h45-0-67" id="h45-0-67" class="d">-            
   3149 </a><a href="#h45-0-68" id="h45-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3150 </a><a href="#h45-0-69" id="h45-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/ux/&quot;&gt;#Ux&lt;/a&gt;
   3151 </a><a href="#h45-0-70" id="h45-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   3152 </a><a href="#h45-0-71" id="h45-0-71" class="d">-            
   3153 </a><a href="#h45-0-72" id="h45-0-72" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   3154 </a><a href="#h45-0-73" id="h45-0-73" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3155 </a><a href="#h45-0-74" id="h45-0-74" class="d">-
   3156 </a><a href="#h45-0-75" id="h45-0-75" class="d">-
   3157 </a><a href="#h45-0-76" id="h45-0-76" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   3158 </a><a href="#h45-0-77" id="h45-0-77" class="d">-        
   3159 </a><a href="#h45-0-78" id="h45-0-78" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3160 </a><a href="#h45-0-79" id="h45-0-79" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   3161 </a><a href="#h45-0-80" id="h45-0-80" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3162 </a><a href="#h45-0-81" id="h45-0-81" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   3163 </a><a href="#h45-0-82" id="h45-0-82" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem &lt;strong&gt;markdownum illum&lt;/strong&gt;: possem pectore trucis genitus volat de ictu reparet, repetenda translata tulit. Celanda sed. Contulerat flavum; tua versus patiensque dumque nemorum. Caput colla nomen aras vela tum favilla velle unica, venit poenaeque expertem in ligones huius et invenit libat &lt;em&gt;resupinus&lt;/em&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
   3164 </a><a href="#h45-0-83" id="h45-0-83" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   3165 </a><a href="#h45-0-84" id="h45-0-84" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Est umeri poenaeque&lt;/li&gt;
   3166 </a><a href="#h45-0-85" id="h45-0-85" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Quae silvas sacerdos crescit&lt;/li&gt;
   3167 </a><a href="#h45-0-86" id="h45-0-86" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Matre tenebras propensum stramine mearum Aiax metusque&lt;/li&gt;
   3168 </a><a href="#h45-0-87" id="h45-0-87" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Plura harundine talia&lt;/li&gt;
   3169 </a><a href="#h45-0-88" id="h45-0-88" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Timentia iunctissimus&lt;/li&gt;
   3170 </a><a href="#h45-0-89" id="h45-0-89" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Non caeloque infantem&lt;/li&gt;
   3171 </a><a href="#h45-0-90" id="h45-0-90" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   3172 </a><a href="#h45-0-91" id="h45-0-91" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Dextra Sabini! Proles sceleris: longa est mea haec hoc tempore adiutus tamen. Venandi fronte patrium accipiunt potum intumuit fluvios tutum properare inmittite saepe? Mihi par visis.&lt;/p&gt;
   3173 </a><a href="#h45-0-92" id="h45-0-92" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-cum-auro-corpus-utve-geratis-ripas-inpellit&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-cum-auro-corpus-utve-geratis-ripas-inpellit&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Cum auro corpus utve geratis ripas inpellit&lt;/h2&gt;
   3174 </a><a href="#h45-0-93" id="h45-0-93" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Stabat quod obvia, &lt;a href=&quot;#misso-nataeque&quot;&gt;patientem&lt;/a&gt;: Erinys moveant, et peragit aethere facturus. Foedera ad oculis aura albo unda induit: retro omne est ergo damus genero ab cursuque Stygio di inde.&lt;/p&gt;
   3175 </a><a href="#h45-0-94" id="h45-0-94" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   3176 </a><a href="#h45-0-95" id="h45-0-95" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Apud arce animam, Phrygiae et colla paene habentem ad ipsum. Fratrem est concipit nisi, morientia sine &lt;strong&gt;pantherarum lucum&lt;/strong&gt;; modo. In proles vellet hostem flebile saeva &lt;strong&gt;amantem&lt;/strong&gt; vitae forte invitique, videt quam bracchia ruit.&lt;/p&gt;
   3177 </a><a href="#h45-0-96" id="h45-0-96" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   3178 </a><a href="#h45-0-97" id="h45-0-97" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Est inque corpora: Aesonis: &lt;a href=&quot;#ulnas-fruitur&quot;&gt;at suis&lt;/a&gt; eadem tamen securim &lt;strong&gt;sub roseo iamdudum&lt;/strong&gt; geminis pervenisse colorem, dat fronte! Ventus procorum et annum praecipitique figura, sub nati revulsum propius tamen fuisset adest Prothoenora frondes. Gorgonis &lt;strong&gt;fata umidus tristi&lt;/strong&gt; quaecumque o pariter, non adiit; ipsa Stygia.&lt;/p&gt;
   3179 </a><a href="#h45-0-98" id="h45-0-98" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Memor debent, quo si Cepheus tecti es ipsa aut horrendis harenas quoque. Quacumque habebunt Semeleia vultu. Est corpus properant tibi.&lt;/p&gt;
   3180 </a><a href="#h45-0-99" id="h45-0-99" class="d">-
   3181 </a><a href="#h45-0-100" id="h45-0-100" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3182 </a><a href="#h45-0-101" id="h45-0-101" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;

   3292 </a><a href="#h46-0-65" id="h46-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;

   3294 </a><a href="#h46-0-67" id="h46-0-67" class="d">-

   3305 </a><a href="#h46-0-78" id="h46-0-78" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;

   3307 </a><a href="#h46-0-80" id="h46-0-80" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3308 </a><a href="#h46-0-81" id="h46-0-81" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   3309 </a><a href="#h46-0-82" id="h46-0-82" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum, bracchia iuvenis teneo, nec urget, iuvenum nec adusque. Quaerit laborum parientibus inde eloquitur impune passu coronam sed maritae oculis, valuissent ne breve novis. Nec aliena facies agros sub cupiunt Credulitas, alumnus sermonibus, medium, gemellos. Sibi nec videbor negabat; et etiam offensi amnis interea donec sanguis forsitan descenderat nempe altior!&lt;/p&gt;
   3310 </a><a href="#h46-0-83" id="h46-0-83" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   3311 </a><a href="#h46-0-84" id="h46-0-84" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Litora optasse visa tellus&lt;/li&gt;
   3312 </a><a href="#h46-0-85" id="h46-0-85" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Lacrimante corripitur frustra conveniunt colla est inridet&lt;/li&gt;
   3313 </a><a href="#h46-0-86" id="h46-0-86" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Super poscis&lt;/li&gt;
   3314 </a><a href="#h46-0-87" id="h46-0-87" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ne velamina suos iuventus&lt;/li&gt;
   3315 </a><a href="#h46-0-88" id="h46-0-88" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   3316 </a><a href="#h46-0-89" id="h46-0-89" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-et-murmur-summa-titan-esto-ut-opprimere&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-et-murmur-summa-titan-esto-ut-opprimere&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Et murmur summa Titan esto ut opprimere&lt;/h2&gt;
   3317 </a><a href="#h46-0-90" id="h46-0-90" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Referens timeas fides, haut sic vultusque, culpa latitantem in eadem, ossa dubitat. &lt;em&gt;Atracides et imber&lt;/em&gt; vires dies placuere indignatus ardetque exire. His summa flexerat perit! Pro partu suorum ille; populos lacu positaeque vocant regia puerpera valentes o pes. Cereris rerum cornua pavet Alemoniden vitae pereunt laetum.&lt;/p&gt;
   3318 </a><a href="#h46-0-91" id="h46-0-91" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-sit-potuit-sinus-achille-tortum&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-sit-potuit-sinus-achille-tortum&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Sit potuit sinus Achille tortum&lt;/h2&gt;
   3319 </a><a href="#h46-0-92" id="h46-0-92" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Cauda corpore leto curas tamen pluma, ipse &lt;em&gt;fecundus&lt;/em&gt;, nihil viris cuspide convivia sanctaque. Spectatae inpetus patulo faciendus Tethys festumque exterrita nota, litora paventis inque; hic? Ingemit et frontes tumefactum hanc, nil perque stetit, factas adductaque cubilia anno, &lt;strong&gt;sanguinis&lt;/strong&gt;: munus &lt;strong&gt;postquam&lt;/strong&gt;? Stuppea illa cretus? Et gaudia et moras male defecta aquarum et grates conbibitur Mendesius thyrso ausus!&lt;/p&gt;
   3320 </a><a href="#h46-0-93" id="h46-0-93" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Umida infamia colorum ille lacrimas, et gaudet erat hasta. Iudicis orant haerentes et, ad messes &lt;strong&gt;etenim&lt;/strong&gt; veneni abit pendens imitatur dixit. Unum et alite ecce quoque hamo vult etiam in nigrae. Pater cava, multicavo portasse habet, nullus rem inpulsu ense nec albentia.&lt;/p&gt;
   3321 </a><a href="#h46-0-94" id="h46-0-94" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-generi-iactanti-tibi-medio-conposuit-inferias-quibus&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-generi-iactanti-tibi-medio-conposuit-inferias-quibus&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Generi iactanti tibi medio conposuit inferias quibus&lt;/h2&gt;
   3322 </a><a href="#h46-0-95" id="h46-0-95" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Nec est attigimus data, nec et territus quicquam cibique &lt;a href=&quot;#inpono&quot;&gt;inundet sepulcro&lt;/a&gt;, adiecerit. Totiens nutrici nec sanguine favore speculatur Cicones Delphice; ore sine lumina.&lt;/p&gt;
   3323 </a><a href="#h46-0-96" id="h46-0-96" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Sic inde molle gradientis verum, amoris Cypron plurimus toris &lt;strong&gt;dea semideique&lt;/strong&gt; fiducia malis motibus, is, est. Aera lingua sequerere mille lintea eadem nodosaque potest sedisti vocatur. Nomine non haec, posse nota foedera sopita. Sed animoque felix videtur &lt;em&gt;aequoreae at&lt;/em&gt; quae, haustus tu inrita oculos. Quam lumbis dictis, accensae sole manu in illi strepitum videar.&lt;/p&gt;
   3324 </a><a href="#h46-0-97" id="h46-0-97" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Gestae &lt;strong&gt;ferre mecum fata&lt;/strong&gt; spatium, est acta ieiunia sperat praecipue habuere. Proteu esse secedit fata hac suis: ieiunia &lt;a href=&quot;#una&quot;&gt;recens&lt;/a&gt;. Thisbaeas lateri rogus natalibus noverca dextraque sparsae: a rore, quae veste Gyaros fluminis &lt;em&gt;cervixque nec&lt;/em&gt;, coeperunt.&lt;/p&gt;
   3325 </a><a href="#h46-0-98" id="h46-0-98" class="d">-
   3326 </a><a href="#h46-0-99" id="h46-0-99" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3327 </a><a href="#h46-0-100" id="h46-0-100" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   3328 </a><a href="#h46-0-101" id="h46-0-101" class="d">-
   3329 </a><a href="#h46-0-102" id="h46-0-102" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;
   3330 </a><a href="#h46-0-103" id="h46-0-103" class="d">-        &lt;footer class=&quot;site-footer&quot;&gt;
   3331 </a><a href="#h46-0-104" id="h46-0-104" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;
   3332 </a><a href="#h46-0-105" id="h46-0-105" class="d">-        &lt;nav class=&quot;site-footer__navigation&quot; aria-label=&quot;Secondary&quot;&gt;
   3333 </a><a href="#h46-0-106" id="h46-0-106" class="d">-            &lt;ul class=&quot;site-footer__navigation__inner&quot;&gt;
   3334 </a><a href="#h46-0-107" id="h46-0-107" class="d">-                
   3335 </a><a href="#h46-0-108" id="h46-0-108" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;
   3336 </a><a href="#h46-0-109" id="h46-0-109" class="d">-                        &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/&quot; rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;Build with Eleventy&lt;/a&gt;
   3337 </a><a href="#h46-0-110" id="h46-0-110" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   3338 </a><a href="#h46-0-111" id="h46-0-111" class="d">-                
   3339 </a><a href="#h46-0-112" id="h46-0-112" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;
   3340 </a><a href="#h46-0-113" id="h46-0-113" class="d">-                        &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.twitter.com/BitByte_&quot; rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;Twitter&lt;/a&gt;
   3341 </a><a href="#h46-0-114" id="h46-0-114" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   3342 </a><a href="#h46-0-115" id="h46-0-115" class="d">-                
   3343 </a><a href="#h46-0-116" id="h46-0-116" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;
   3344 </a><a href="#h46-0-117" id="h46-0-117" class="d">-                        &lt;a href=&quot;https://codepen.io/hectoraldairah&quot; rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;Codepen&lt;/a&gt;
   3345 </a><a href="#h46-0-118" id="h46-0-118" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   3346 </a><a href="#h46-0-119" id="h46-0-119" class="d">-                
   3347 </a><a href="#h46-0-120" id="h46-0-120" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;
   3348 </a><a href="#h46-0-121" id="h46-0-121" class="d">-                        &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/hectoraldairah&quot; rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;Github&lt;/a&gt;
   3349 </a><a href="#h46-0-122" id="h46-0-122" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   3350 </a><a href="#h46-0-123" id="h46-0-123" class="d">-                
   3351 </a><a href="#h46-0-124" id="h46-0-124" class="d">-                    &lt;li&gt;
   3352 </a><a href="#h46-0-125" id="h46-0-125" class="d">-                        &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.linkedin.com/in/hectoraldairaguilar&quot; rel=&quot;noopener noreferrer&quot; target=&quot;_blank&quot;&gt;LinkedIn&lt;/a&gt;
   3353 </a><a href="#h46-0-126" id="h46-0-126" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   3354 </a><a href="#h46-0-127" id="h46-0-127" class="d">-                
   3355 </a><a href="#h46-0-128" id="h46-0-128" class="d">-            &lt;/ul&gt;
   3356 </a><a href="#h46-0-129" id="h46-0-129" class="d">-            &lt;ul class=&quot;site-footer__navigation__outer&quot;&gt;
   3357 </a><a href="#h46-0-130" id="h46-0-130" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3358 </a><a href="#h46-0-131" id="h46-0-131" class="d">-                    &lt;a&gt;RSS&lt;/a&gt;

   3361 </a><a href="#h46-0-134" id="h46-0-134" class="d">-                    &lt;a&gt;Github&lt;/a&gt;

   3430 </a><a href="#h47-0-58" id="h47-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;Quick and simple image placeholder&lt;/h1&gt;
   3431 </a><a href="#h47-0-59" id="h47-0-59" class="d">-        
   3432 </a><a href="#h47-0-60" id="h47-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   3433 </a><a href="#h47-0-61" id="h47-0-61" class="d">-                
   3434 </a><a href="#h47-0-62" id="h47-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Sep 27, 2019&quot;&gt;Sep 27, 2019&lt;/time&gt;
   3435 </a><a href="#h47-0-63" id="h47-0-63" class="d">-
   3436 </a><a href="#h47-0-64" id="h47-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3437 </a><a href="#h47-0-65" id="h47-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   3438 </a><a href="#h47-0-66" id="h47-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   3439 </a><a href="#h47-0-67" id="h47-0-67" class="d">-            
   3440 </a><a href="#h47-0-68" id="h47-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3441 </a><a href="#h47-0-69" id="h47-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/tips-and-tricks/&quot;&gt;#TipsAndTricks&lt;/a&gt;
   3442 </a><a href="#h47-0-70" id="h47-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   3443 </a><a href="#h47-0-71" id="h47-0-71" class="d">-            
   3444 </a><a href="#h47-0-72" id="h47-0-72" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   3445 </a><a href="#h47-0-73" id="h47-0-73" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3446 </a><a href="#h47-0-74" id="h47-0-74" class="d">-
   3447 </a><a href="#h47-0-75" id="h47-0-75" class="d">-
   3448 </a><a href="#h47-0-76" id="h47-0-76" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   3449 </a><a href="#h47-0-77" id="h47-0-77" class="d">-        
   3450 </a><a href="#h47-0-78" id="h47-0-78" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3451 </a><a href="#h47-0-79" id="h47-0-79" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   3452 </a><a href="#h47-0-80" id="h47-0-80" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3453 </a><a href="#h47-0-81" id="h47-0-81" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   3454 </a><a href="#h47-0-82" id="h47-0-82" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Lorem markdownum&lt;/em&gt; clamor, ver gemitus numen se dura mortalia inquit, sine telum durata licet teretes delphina, ex! Et genus. Amissum quam genus ambieratque messes; et Ithacus bracchia; ergo famuli inquit Lyncidae ex vestibus premebat. Rogis crimine nunc hae falsaque, dignus.&lt;/p&gt;
   3455 </a><a href="#h47-0-83" id="h47-0-83" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   3456 </a><a href="#h47-0-84" id="h47-0-84" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Summo lucis vultus&lt;/li&gt;
   3457 </a><a href="#h47-0-85" id="h47-0-85" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Sororum esse&lt;/li&gt;
   3458 </a><a href="#h47-0-86" id="h47-0-86" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Magni exire caelestia utque totidem prisci plurima&lt;/li&gt;
   3459 </a><a href="#h47-0-87" id="h47-0-87" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Templum dolores belua aut gravis ut fraudem&lt;/li&gt;
   3460 </a><a href="#h47-0-88" id="h47-0-88" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Formam nata bracchia Cnosia amor esse coniuge&lt;/li&gt;
   3461 </a><a href="#h47-0-89" id="h47-0-89" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   3462 </a><a href="#h47-0-90" id="h47-0-90" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Anxius destringere Daedale, poenae te, leti sibi novissimus astris portus pressoque me mutavit crimine, speciem in. Pariter postis, solam?&lt;/p&gt;
   3463 </a><a href="#h47-0-91" id="h47-0-91" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-graciles-lycaeo-ab-nihil-ad-avis-phoebe&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-graciles-lycaeo-ab-nihil-ad-avis-phoebe&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Graciles Lycaeo ab nihil ad avis Phoebe&lt;/h2&gt;
   3464 </a><a href="#h47-0-92" id="h47-0-92" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Emathion est labore vagae? Adpositi quaerunt in torvo; dei laeva similis. Enim quam agitataque Martis, una misero &lt;strong&gt;sed fugam&lt;/strong&gt; coniecto.&lt;/p&gt;
   3465 </a><a href="#h47-0-93" id="h47-0-93" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   3466 </a><a href="#h47-0-94" id="h47-0-94" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;De fitque correpto usum est fallaci medium&lt;/li&gt;
   3467 </a><a href="#h47-0-95" id="h47-0-95" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Moenia sensimus vidisse calorque&lt;/li&gt;
   3468 </a><a href="#h47-0-96" id="h47-0-96" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Lata tuae profugaque stetit videre haberet&lt;/li&gt;
   3469 </a><a href="#h47-0-97" id="h47-0-97" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Dant manuque Icare&lt;/li&gt;
   3470 </a><a href="#h47-0-98" id="h47-0-98" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   3471 </a><a href="#h47-0-99" id="h47-0-99" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Aut telum naidas ducibusque: orbem Venus latosque dicere oscula, praemia lasso indestrictus namque nec et refert Telamon. Similisque &lt;em&gt;iuvenis relanguit refert&lt;/em&gt; uterum boves. Sed flenti inquit; ait iure squalidus e pennae adverso et carne haec adsunt; hoc. Solio adfectas Erymanthon eruerit tollens, &lt;strong&gt;est traxit&lt;/strong&gt; robore at. Aras veterem virtus et ad viridi sceleratus, penitusque totum.&lt;/p&gt;
   3472 </a><a href="#h47-0-100" id="h47-0-100" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Sic nec labare digitos tempore, mea, erat matri repagula pectore dona. Parvo moveri tantum! &lt;strong&gt;Nec sed&lt;/strong&gt; est et, Nereaque et tellus sidereis nimium! Locus nam, non naribus lotos &lt;a href=&quot;#simul-tua-tenent&quot;&gt;de&lt;/a&gt; nivea viros merui semina leves, vobis se vallem agris et. Interea quae dixere illa, undis haec ipse sanguine moriens.&lt;/p&gt;
   3473 </a><a href="#h47-0-101" id="h47-0-101" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Summae sui tentoria coercuit, ora uncis nunc, exhorruit colunt supersint spectem, Io premunt natum Oeclides Iovis. Membra volvere sororum libera murmura, habet adultera, semine finitur, te te illi pennis nomen, nec quisquis. Frustra perque, ipse membris et poma vincinaque umeris iste? Longus et a margine igitur esse, est mutavit ille abest mihi circuitu tempore possent. Ultima &lt;a href=&quot;#se&quot;&gt;silvis thalamo&lt;/a&gt; vestras, &lt;em&gt;quae probat&lt;/em&gt; curia medium Chaonius necopina, te nostraque armos quod Colchi.&lt;/p&gt;
   3474 </a><a href="#h47-0-102" id="h47-0-102" class="d">-
   3475 </a><a href="#h47-0-103" id="h47-0-103" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3476 </a><a href="#h47-0-104" id="h47-0-104" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   3477 </a><a href="#h47-0-105" id="h47-0-105" class="d">-
   3478 </a><a href="#h47-0-106" id="h47-0-106" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;
   3479 </a><a href="#h47-0-107" id="h47-0-107" class="d">-        &lt;footer class=&quot;site-footer&quot;&gt;
   3480 </a><a href="#h47-0-108" id="h47-0-108" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;

a::before{content:&quot;&quot;;display:block;position:absolute;bottom:-.5rem;left:0;width:100%;height:.2rem;background:#e9a6a6;transform:scaleX(0);transition:transform .2s linear;transform-origin:bottom left}.nav a:hover::before{transform:scaleX(1);background:rgba(233,166,166,.75)}.nav a[data-state=active]::before,.nav a[data-state=page]::before{content:&quot;&quot;;transform:scaleX(1);background:#e9a6a6}.link{display:inline-block;color:#e9a6a6;font-weight:700}.page-header{padding:3rem 0;text-align:center}.page-header h1{font-size:3rem}@media (min-width:48em){.page-header h1{font-size:5rem}}root{--flow-space:1.6rem}html{font-size:18px}body{display:flex;flex-direction:column;background:#0a0a19;color:#f8f8f8;line-height:1.5;font-size:1.25rem;font-family:Nunito,Arial,sans-serif;overflow-x:hidden;min-height:100vh}main:focus{outline:0}h1,h2,h3,h4{font-weight:900;font-family:Lora,serif}a{color:inherit}:focus{outline:2px dashed #f8f8f8;outline-offset:.1rem}::selection{background:#3f3351}::-webkit-scrollbar{height:1rem;background:#864879}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background-color:transparent;border-radius:.25rem}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{border-radius:0;background:#3f3351}
   3531 </a><a href="#h48-0-10" id="h48-0-10" class="d">-        &lt;/style&gt;
   3532 </a><a href="#h48-0-11" id="h48-0-11" class="d">-
   3533 </a><a href="#h48-0-12" id="h48-0-12" class="d">-        
   3534 </a><a href="#h48-0-13" id="h48-0-13" class="d">-        
   3535 </a><a href="#h48-0-14" id="h48-0-14" class="d">-            
   3536 </a><a href="#h48-0-15" id="h48-0-15" class="d">-                &lt;style&gt;
   3537 </a><a href="#h48-0-16" id="h48-0-16" class="d">-                    .post-list__item{padding-bottom:4rem}.post-list__item__info{display:flex;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:1rem;color:rgba(248,248,248,.68);gap:1.25rem}.post-list__item__info a{text-decoration-color:#e9a6a6;padding:.2rem .4rem;background-color:#864879;border-radius:10%}.post-list__item__date{padding-bottom:.8rem 0}.post-list__item__excerpt{padding:1.25rem 0}.post-list__link{font-size:2rem;color:#e9a6a6;text-decoration:none;font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:700}.post-list__link:hover{color:#864879}.tags-list{display:flex;justify-content:space-around}.page-content{line-height:1.6;padding-bottom:1.6rem}.page-content blockquote{border-inline-start:1rem solid;padding-inline-start:1.6rem;padding-top:1.6rem;padding-bottom:1.6rem;margin-top:1.6rem;margin-bottom:1.6rem;font-style:italic;border:solid 2px #864879;padding:20px 30px 20px 30px;box-shadow:13px 13px 0 0 #3f3351,15px 15px 0 0 #864879,15px 11px 0 0 #864879,11px 15px 0 0 #864879}.page-content h2{font-size:2rem}.page-content h3{font-size:1.6rem}.page-content li+li{margin-top:.8rem}.page-content h2,.page-content h3{margin-top:.8rem;margin-bottom:.8rem}.page-content h2+*,.page-content h3+*{--flow-space:0.8rem}.page-content p{margin-top:1.25rem;margin-bottom:1.25rem}time[datetime]{display:block;color:#e9a6a6;font-size:2rem;font-style:italic}
   3538 </a><a href="#h48-0-17" id="h48-0-17" class="d">-                &lt;/style&gt;
   3539 </a><a href="#h48-0-18" id="h48-0-18" class="d">-            
   3540 </a><a href="#h48-0-19" id="h48-0-19" class="d">-        
   3541 </a><a href="#h48-0-20" id="h48-0-20" class="d">-
   3542 </a><a href="#h48-0-21" id="h48-0-21" class="d">-        &lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; media=&quot;print&quot; href=&quot;/fonts/fonts.css?8840-39de-d2c5&quot; onload=&quot;this.media=&#39;all&#39;&quot;/&gt;
   3543 </a><a href="#h48-0-22" id="h48-0-22" class="d">-
   3544 </a><a href="#h48-0-23" id="h48-0-23" class="d">-        
   3545 </a><a href="#h48-0-24" id="h48-0-24" class="d">-        
   3546 </a><a href="#h48-0-25" id="h48-0-25" class="d">-
   3547 </a><a href="#h48-0-26" id="h48-0-26" class="d">-    &lt;/head&gt;
   3548 </a><a href="#h48-0-27" id="h48-0-27" class="d">-    &lt;body&gt;
   3549 </a><a href="#h48-0-28" id="h48-0-28" class="d">-        &lt;header role=&quot;banner&quot; class=&quot;site-head&quot;&gt;
   3550 </a><a href="#h48-0-29" id="h48-0-29" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;
   3551 </a><a href="#h48-0-30" id="h48-0-30" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;site-head__inner&quot;&gt;
   3552 </a><a href="#h48-0-31" id="h48-0-31" class="d">-            &lt;a href=&quot;/&quot; aria-label=&quot;bitbyte - home&quot; class=&quot;site-head__brand&quot;&gt;
   3553 </a><a href="#h48-0-32" id="h48-0-32" class="d">-                &lt;h1&gt;bitbyte&lt;/h1&gt;
   3554 </a><a href="#h48-0-33" id="h48-0-33" class="d">-            &lt;/a&gt;
   3555 </a><a href="#h48-0-34" id="h48-0-34" class="d">-            &lt;nav class=&quot;[ nav ] [ site-head__nav ]&quot; aria-label=&quot;Primary&quot;&gt;
   3556 </a><a href="#h48-0-35" id="h48-0-35" class="d">-                &lt;ul class=&quot;nav__list&quot;&gt;
   3557 </a><a href="#h48-0-36" id="h48-0-36" class="d">-                    
   3558 </a><a href="#h48-0-37" id="h48-0-37" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;

   3560 </a><a href="#h48-0-39" id="h48-0-39" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   3561 </a><a href="#h48-0-40" id="h48-0-40" class="d">-                    
   3562 </a><a href="#h48-0-41" id="h48-0-41" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;

   3564 </a><a href="#h48-0-43" id="h48-0-43" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;

   3566 </a><a href="#h48-0-45" id="h48-0-45" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   3567 </a><a href="#h48-0-46" id="h48-0-46" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/about/&quot; &gt;about&lt;/a&gt;
   3568 </a><a href="#h48-0-47" id="h48-0-47" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   3569 </a><a href="#h48-0-48" id="h48-0-48" class="d">-                    
   3570 </a><a href="#h48-0-49" id="h48-0-49" class="d">-                &lt;/ul&gt;
   3571 </a><a href="#h48-0-50" id="h48-0-50" class="d">-            &lt;/nav&gt;
   3572 </a><a href="#h48-0-51" id="h48-0-51" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3573 </a><a href="#h48-0-52" id="h48-0-52" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3574 </a><a href="#h48-0-53" id="h48-0-53" class="d">-&lt;/header&gt;
   3575 </a><a href="#h48-0-54" id="h48-0-54" class="d">-        &lt;main tabindex=&quot;-1&quot; id=&quot;main-content&quot;&gt;
   3576 </a><a href="#h48-0-55" id="h48-0-55" class="d">-            
   3577 </a><a href="#h48-0-56" id="h48-0-56" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header ]&quot;&gt;
   3578 </a><a href="#h48-0-57" id="h48-0-57" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&quot;&gt;
   3579 </a><a href="#h48-0-58" id="h48-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;Typography tips for the web&lt;/h1&gt;
   3580 </a><a href="#h48-0-59" id="h48-0-59" class="d">-        
   3581 </a><a href="#h48-0-60" id="h48-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   3582 </a><a href="#h48-0-61" id="h48-0-61" class="d">-                
   3583 </a><a href="#h48-0-62" id="h48-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Dec 3, 2019&quot;&gt;Dec 3, 2019&lt;/time&gt;
   3584 </a><a href="#h48-0-63" id="h48-0-63" class="d">-
   3585 </a><a href="#h48-0-64" id="h48-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3586 </a><a href="#h48-0-65" id="h48-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   3587 </a><a href="#h48-0-66" id="h48-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   3588 </a><a href="#h48-0-67" id="h48-0-67" class="d">-            
   3589 </a><a href="#h48-0-68" id="h48-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3590 </a><a href="#h48-0-69" id="h48-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/tips-and-tricks/&quot;&gt;#TipsAndTricks&lt;/a&gt;
   3591 </a><a href="#h48-0-70" id="h48-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   3592 </a><a href="#h48-0-71" id="h48-0-71" class="d">-            
   3593 </a><a href="#h48-0-72" id="h48-0-72" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   3594 </a><a href="#h48-0-73" id="h48-0-73" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3595 </a><a href="#h48-0-74" id="h48-0-74" class="d">-
   3596 </a><a href="#h48-0-75" id="h48-0-75" class="d">-
   3597 </a><a href="#h48-0-76" id="h48-0-76" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   3598 </a><a href="#h48-0-77" id="h48-0-77" class="d">-        
   3599 </a><a href="#h48-0-78" id="h48-0-78" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3600 </a><a href="#h48-0-79" id="h48-0-79" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   3601 </a><a href="#h48-0-80" id="h48-0-80" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3602 </a><a href="#h48-0-81" id="h48-0-81" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   3603 </a><a href="#h48-0-82" id="h48-0-82" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum pectus neque! Nomen et cepit in caedis protinus, motumque aderam collumque sedem domum.&lt;/p&gt;
   3604 </a><a href="#h48-0-83" id="h48-0-83" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   3605 </a><a href="#h48-0-84" id="h48-0-84" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Erat cervus haec&lt;/li&gt;
   3606 </a><a href="#h48-0-85" id="h48-0-85" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Inscribit maximus&lt;/li&gt;
   3607 </a><a href="#h48-0-86" id="h48-0-86" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Annos cum iuvene iustissimus pater cinctasque genetrix&lt;/li&gt;
   3608 </a><a href="#h48-0-87" id="h48-0-87" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   3609 </a><a href="#h48-0-88" id="h48-0-88" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-per-ultro-ortum-gravidae-temperat&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-per-ultro-ortum-gravidae-temperat&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Per ultro ortum gravidae temperat&lt;/h2&gt;
   3610 </a><a href="#h48-0-89" id="h48-0-89" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Ulla quod tuum &lt;strong&gt;easdem&lt;/strong&gt; subiere, Atrides plura, Pagasaeae paret sentit. Manibusque virginis, coniugium auras: Venerem damna fugacibus cristati viget in rogos breve! O serva dolentem totidem avertitur et minus, tuens in tela boum habent leaeque. Aris aras lympha Memnonis tenebrae et nominis &lt;strong&gt;fratribus&lt;/strong&gt; tuae premens nitore ademi ope fallaci summo, &lt;strong&gt;mortisque&lt;/strong&gt; sanguine. Utque moras tellus frigida vestes, nec fiant manat de parenti velamina.&lt;/p&gt;
   3611 </a><a href="#h48-0-90" id="h48-0-90" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   3612 </a><a href="#h48-0-91" id="h48-0-91" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Flammas anguis&lt;/li&gt;
   3613 </a><a href="#h48-0-92" id="h48-0-92" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Sceleratos sanguinis validi corpore dederat verbis numinis&lt;/li&gt;
   3614 </a><a href="#h48-0-93" id="h48-0-93" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Eratque mitissima&lt;/li&gt;
   3615 </a><a href="#h48-0-94" id="h48-0-94" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Carebis armis demas unus retendit&lt;/li&gt;
   3616 </a><a href="#h48-0-95" id="h48-0-95" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Fuit Iuno securi&lt;/li&gt;
   3617 </a><a href="#h48-0-96" id="h48-0-96" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   3618 </a><a href="#h48-0-97" id="h48-0-97" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-contra-quasi-transferre-et-imago-quoque-manu&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-contra-quasi-transferre-et-imago-quoque-manu&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Contra quasi transferre et imago quoque manu&lt;/h2&gt;
   3619 </a><a href="#h48-0-98" id="h48-0-98" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Transire stratis, ut &lt;strong&gt;se&lt;/strong&gt; exiguo plenis &lt;strong&gt;clarum armiger simulati&lt;/strong&gt; tuum. Potentior a &lt;a href=&quot;#inque&quot;&gt;pavidam&lt;/a&gt;, inque modo colle &lt;strong&gt;colubrasque porrigis&lt;/strong&gt; altae in aura, at attactu. Et fessis longo; abi de, egi anni, habeo pars tecta extimuit.&lt;/p&gt;
   3620 </a><a href="#h48-0-99" id="h48-0-99" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Mota crimina, honor misit &lt;em&gt;amnis humo&lt;/em&gt;, ter vidi medios terga, sprevere. Est nunc plangor concurrere opifer ore, eurytus tellus.&lt;/p&gt;
   3621 </a><a href="#h48-0-100" id="h48-0-100" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Rurigenae Parnasia proelia confertque nostri; ore cum lanas regna! Est annis magnis protinus, Pleionesque et id longi sorte Tonantis. Et quod, est artes negarent primus, haec stipitis scopulis modo honorem has meis prius manus tempus ni foedabis.&lt;/p&gt;
   3622 </a><a href="#h48-0-101" id="h48-0-101" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Repulsam iuvenum somnos percusso salutis decimum manes! Lucida et amabam date nectare concipit humano. Vidi ardet nihil faciebat saevique nitorem quoque quidem victa.&lt;/p&gt;
   3623 </a><a href="#h48-0-102" id="h48-0-102" class="d">-
   3624 </a><a href="#h48-0-103" id="h48-0-103" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3625 </a><a href="#h48-0-104" id="h48-0-104" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   3626 </a><a href="#h48-0-105" id="h48-0-105" class="d">-
   3627 </a><a href="#h48-0-106" id="h48-0-106" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;

   3670 </a><a href="#h49-0-0" id="h49-0-0" class="d">-
   3671 </a><a href="#h49-0-1" id="h49-0-1" class="d">-&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;

   3705 </a><a href="#h49-0-35" id="h49-0-35" class="d">-                &lt;ul class=&quot;nav__list&quot;&gt;
   3706 </a><a href="#h49-0-36" id="h49-0-36" class="d">-                    
   3707 </a><a href="#h49-0-37" id="h49-0-37" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   3708 </a><a href="#h49-0-38" id="h49-0-38" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/&quot; &gt;home&lt;/a&gt;
   3709 </a><a href="#h49-0-39" id="h49-0-39" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   3710 </a><a href="#h49-0-40" id="h49-0-40" class="d">-                    
   3711 </a><a href="#h49-0-41" id="h49-0-41" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   3712 </a><a href="#h49-0-42" id="h49-0-42" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/blog/&quot; &gt;blog&lt;/a&gt;
   3713 </a><a href="#h49-0-43" id="h49-0-43" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   3714 </a><a href="#h49-0-44" id="h49-0-44" class="d">-                    
   3715 </a><a href="#h49-0-45" id="h49-0-45" class="d">-                        &lt;li&gt;
   3716 </a><a href="#h49-0-46" id="h49-0-46" class="d">-                            &lt;a href=&quot;/about/&quot; &gt;about&lt;/a&gt;
   3717 </a><a href="#h49-0-47" id="h49-0-47" class="d">-                        &lt;/li&gt;
   3718 </a><a href="#h49-0-48" id="h49-0-48" class="d">-                    
   3719 </a><a href="#h49-0-49" id="h49-0-49" class="d">-                &lt;/ul&gt;
   3720 </a><a href="#h49-0-50" id="h49-0-50" class="d">-            &lt;/nav&gt;
   3721 </a><a href="#h49-0-51" id="h49-0-51" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3722 </a><a href="#h49-0-52" id="h49-0-52" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3723 </a><a href="#h49-0-53" id="h49-0-53" class="d">-&lt;/header&gt;
   3724 </a><a href="#h49-0-54" id="h49-0-54" class="d">-        &lt;main tabindex=&quot;-1&quot; id=&quot;main-content&quot;&gt;
   3725 </a><a href="#h49-0-55" id="h49-0-55" class="d">-            
   3726 </a><a href="#h49-0-56" id="h49-0-56" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header ]&quot;&gt;
   3727 </a><a href="#h49-0-57" id="h49-0-57" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;[ wrapper ] [ flow ]&quot;&gt;
   3728 </a><a href="#h49-0-58" id="h49-0-58" class="d">-        &lt;h1&gt;Why cross-cultural design really matters&lt;/h1&gt;
   3729 </a><a href="#h49-0-59" id="h49-0-59" class="d">-        
   3730 </a><a href="#h49-0-60" id="h49-0-60" class="d">-            &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-header__summary ] [ measure-long ]&quot;&gt;
   3731 </a><a href="#h49-0-61" id="h49-0-61" class="d">-                
   3732 </a><a href="#h49-0-62" id="h49-0-62" class="d">-&lt;time datetime=&quot;Mar 31, 2020&quot;&gt;Mar 31, 2020&lt;/time&gt;
   3733 </a><a href="#h49-0-63" id="h49-0-63" class="d">-
   3734 </a><a href="#h49-0-64" id="h49-0-64" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3735 </a><a href="#h49-0-65" id="h49-0-65" class="d">-        &lt;p class=&quot;visually-hidden&quot; id=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;Tags that this post has been filed under.&lt;/p&gt;
   3736 </a><a href="#h49-0-66" id="h49-0-66" class="d">-        &lt;ul class=&quot;[ tags-list ]&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;tags-desc&quot;&gt;
   3737 </a><a href="#h49-0-67" id="h49-0-67" class="d">-            
   3738 </a><a href="#h49-0-68" id="h49-0-68" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3739 </a><a href="#h49-0-69" id="h49-0-69" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/culture/&quot;&gt;#Culture&lt;/a&gt;
   3740 </a><a href="#h49-0-70" id="h49-0-70" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   3741 </a><a href="#h49-0-71" id="h49-0-71" class="d">-            
   3742 </a><a href="#h49-0-72" id="h49-0-72" class="d">-                &lt;li&gt;
   3743 </a><a href="#h49-0-73" id="h49-0-73" class="d">-                    &lt;a href=&quot;/tag/design-thinking/&quot;&gt;#DesignThinking&lt;/a&gt;
   3744 </a><a href="#h49-0-74" id="h49-0-74" class="d">-                &lt;/li&gt;
   3745 </a><a href="#h49-0-75" id="h49-0-75" class="d">-            
   3746 </a><a href="#h49-0-76" id="h49-0-76" class="d">-        &lt;/ul&gt;
   3747 </a><a href="#h49-0-77" id="h49-0-77" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3748 </a><a href="#h49-0-78" id="h49-0-78" class="d">-
   3749 </a><a href="#h49-0-79" id="h49-0-79" class="d">-
   3750 </a><a href="#h49-0-80" id="h49-0-80" class="d">-            &lt;/div&gt;
   3751 </a><a href="#h49-0-81" id="h49-0-81" class="d">-        
   3752 </a><a href="#h49-0-82" id="h49-0-82" class="d">-    &lt;/div&gt;
   3753 </a><a href="#h49-0-83" id="h49-0-83" class="d">-&lt;/div&gt;
   3754 </a><a href="#h49-0-84" id="h49-0-84" class="d">-    &lt;article class=&quot;constrained&quot;&gt;
   3755 </a><a href="#h49-0-85" id="h49-0-85" class="d">-        &lt;div class=&quot;[ page-content ]&quot;&gt;
   3756 </a><a href="#h49-0-86" id="h49-0-86" class="d">-            &lt;p&gt;Lorem markdownum teneri dives, vota inarsit, numina qui mixto. Oculos quo vestro fero inrequieta magni. Ad inania pedes et volucrem, sub ex facti, nec huc curvamina! Semina cum sonitusque fraterno Meriones animas pervenit iusta populos faciem. Colebat et saepe!&lt;/p&gt;
   3757 </a><a href="#h49-0-87" id="h49-0-87" class="d">-&lt;ol&gt;
   3758 </a><a href="#h49-0-88" id="h49-0-88" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Et Hectoris quaeque&lt;/li&gt;
   3759 </a><a href="#h49-0-89" id="h49-0-89" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Noctis pars&lt;/li&gt;
   3760 </a><a href="#h49-0-90" id="h49-0-90" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Possint dimittere poscitur&lt;/li&gt;
   3761 </a><a href="#h49-0-91" id="h49-0-91" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Sine praemia&lt;/li&gt;
   3762 </a><a href="#h49-0-92" id="h49-0-92" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Genae et sed in regia sonitum non&lt;/li&gt;
   3763 </a><a href="#h49-0-93" id="h49-0-93" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Preme ne perstant non intrarit cura&lt;/li&gt;
   3764 </a><a href="#h49-0-94" id="h49-0-94" class="d">-&lt;/ol&gt;
   3765 </a><a href="#h49-0-95" id="h49-0-95" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-et-habenas-honoratas&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-et-habenas-honoratas&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Et habenas honoratas&lt;/h2&gt;
   3766 </a><a href="#h49-0-96" id="h49-0-96" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Modo talia, nebulae quem. Sed ducit ossaque humilis lumine, excusantia Actorides nec deus. Nec tuas pares regia, inops ne ponti, quamquam, et! Cautes viae capillos communis parce, sub curva dat &lt;strong&gt;nota et&lt;/strong&gt;. Quaeritis inopino ligavit ne perque moriens numquam, mox iaculum apta Ciris, sunt.&lt;/p&gt;
   3767 </a><a href="#h49-0-97" id="h49-0-97" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Perit semideique copia. Quod tu, et &lt;strong&gt;enim&lt;/strong&gt; inmurmurat perque, nocent adfectat ut acrior &lt;a href=&quot;#per-inproba&quot;&gt;missi&lt;/a&gt;. Romanae est! Stipite hasta micante, puppe canities matris virgineosque duo rursus tamen mundus perque deus. Languescuntque Interea contigit ipsosque, est ore &lt;a href=&quot;#umbrosum-medius-esse&quot;&gt;esset&lt;/a&gt;; coronae mandatam quaque os per, deique caedis.&lt;/p&gt;
   3768 </a><a href="#h49-0-98" id="h49-0-98" class="d">-&lt;ul&gt;
   3769 </a><a href="#h49-0-99" id="h49-0-99" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Ille inclusit summa forem arborea tactus in&lt;/li&gt;
   3770 </a><a href="#h49-0-100" id="h49-0-100" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Tellure refert&lt;/li&gt;
   3771 </a><a href="#h49-0-101" id="h49-0-101" class="d">-&lt;li&gt;Huic quantum credere terram&lt;/li&gt;
   3772 </a><a href="#h49-0-102" id="h49-0-102" class="d">-&lt;/ul&gt;
   3773 </a><a href="#h49-0-103" id="h49-0-103" class="d">-&lt;h2 id=&quot;h-aversa-et-sinistra-flava-praemia-proelia-ala&quot; tabindex=&quot;-1&quot;&gt;&lt;a class=&quot;direct-link&quot; href=&quot;#h-aversa-et-sinistra-flava-praemia-proelia-ala&quot; aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;#&lt;/a&gt; Aversa et sinistra flava praemia proelia ala&lt;/h2&gt;
   3774 </a><a href="#h49-0-104" id="h49-0-104" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Suos Pana pudori concubiturus paelex glomeravit, certare querellis, deus salutem tantaeque nomina: &lt;a href=&quot;#ferox-impete-misso&quot;&gt;stetit respiramen ad&lt;/a&gt;. Precor audistis cunctari arce tenui Hippomene satis prospiciens et hinc albentia Lyaeus, nec timetis, in. Iam flavum cantus, Iove Pharonque in linquit &lt;em&gt;attollit&lt;/em&gt;, cum? Versus tendentem et fecere amnis incola vulgares Cereris unguis ignibus obstipuit despexit, desierant componit nec imis capro horrida. Iove splendescunt agebat nubila favete cornibus ducit eadem in inde ignes dixit annis dona habemus litora?&lt;/p&gt;
   3775 </a><a href="#h49-0-105" id="h49-0-105" class="d">-&lt;blockquote&gt;
   3776 </a><a href="#h49-0-106" id="h49-0-106" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Labores ille Thespiades inde, capellae dedi adire cortice! Velant aestuat per extis Mimasque figuram. Pelias concilio credentes induxerat fidem dedit; opem ut flumina quae vulnus specie permanet. Possent non facti pelagi faveas; incubat non et certans. Medea et: tota Dite.&lt;/p&gt;
   3777 </a><a href="#h49-0-107" id="h49-0-107" class="d">-&lt;/blockquote&gt;
   3778 </a><a href="#h49-0-108" id="h49-0-108" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Viri vidit rubor inquit: cum &lt;strong&gt;piscem naides&lt;/strong&gt; ut, sed forcipe nunc arte vulnera naturaque plus, amo. Partim Tritoniaca nimbos quid causam corpore fuit arces ieiunia sagitta tetigere me, quam duce. Volebat &lt;strong&gt;revocata nate&lt;/strong&gt;. Tu orbem locuturo prius dextera vesana &lt;em&gt;hostes adspicias facit&lt;/em&gt;, inde quos.&lt;/p&gt;
   3779 </a><a href="#h49-0-109" id="h49-0-109" class="d">-&lt;p&gt;Hoc et ambo ortu ficta iuvencae crescentem debuerant caedis eo illis sceleratae somni. Pamphagos lapsu me idque lacertis, est pressos, dum. Estque dubitabat tamen gurgite est adicit de Epaphi pulveris cinerem colles &lt;em&gt;eadem publica&lt;/em&gt; vox unam &lt;em&gt;fecisse&lt;/em&gt; palmas Mopsus. In Mycenida fessos subsequitur &lt;strong&gt;femina&lt;/strong&gt; notas: in vocato tamen glaciali.&lt;/p&gt;
   3780 </a><a href="#h49-0-110" id="h49-0-110" class="d">-
   3781 </a><a href="#h49-0-111" id="h49-0-111" class="d">-        &lt;/div&gt;
   3782 </a><a href="#h49-0-112" id="h49-0-112" class="d">-    &lt;/article&gt;
   3783 </a><a href="#h49-0-113" id="h49-0-113" class="d">-
   3784 </a><a href="#h49-0-114" id="h49-0-114" class="d">-        &lt;/main&gt;
   3785 </a><a href="#h49-0-115" id="h49-0-115" class="d">-        &lt;footer class=&quot;site-footer&quot;&gt;
   3786 </a><a href="#h49-0-116" id="h49-0-116" class="d">-    &lt;div class=&quot;wrapper&quot;&gt;

   3808 </a><a href="#h49-0-138" id="h49-0-138" class="d">-                    &lt;/li&gt;
   3809 </a><a href="#h49-0-139" id="h49-0-139" class="d">-

   3826 <a href="#h50-0" id="h50-0" class="h">@@ -0,0 +1,142 @@
   3827 </a><a href="#h50-0-0" id="h50-0-0" class="i">+
   3828 </a><a href="#h50-0-1" id="h50-0-1" class="i">+&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;
   3829 </a><a href="#h50-0-2" id="h50-0-2" class="i">+&lt;html lang=&quot;en&quot;&gt;

   3833 </a><a href="#h50-0-6" id="h50-0-6" class="i">+        &lt;meta name=&quot;viewport&quot; content=&quot;width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0&quot;&gt;
   3834 </a><a href="#h50-0-7" id="h50-0-7" class="i">+        &lt;title&gt;Tag Archive&lt;/title&gt;
   3835 </a><a href="#h50-0-8" id="h50-0-8" class="i">+        &lt;style&gt;
   3836 </a><a href="#h50-0-9" id="h50-0-9" class="i">+            @charset    4066 </a><a href="#h51-0-94" id="h51-0-94" class="i">+                        &lt;p class=&quot;[ post-list__item__excerpt ]&quot;&gt;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat.&lt;/p&gt;

   4215 </a><a href="#h52-0-94" id="h52-0-94" class="i">+                        &lt;p class=&quot;[ post-list__item__excerpt ]&quot;&gt;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat.&lt;/p&gt;

   4360 </a><a href="#h53-0-90" id="h53-0-90" class="i">+                        &lt;p class=&quot;[ post-list__item__excerpt ]&quot;&gt;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat.&lt;/p&gt;

   4505 </a><a href="#h54-0-90" id="h54-0-90" class="i">+                        &lt;p class=&quot;[ post-list__item__excerpt ]&quot;&gt;Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat.&lt;/p&gt;

   5040 <a href="#h70-0-9" id="h70-0-9" class="d">-Lorem markdownum **verbis**, fertur *fas* poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum [illis](#murmurat-veros-tepescunt), et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.
   5041 </a> 
   5042 <a href="#h70-0-11" id="h70-0-11" class="d">-1. Addenda ventis non
   5043 </a><a href="#h70-0-12" id="h70-0-12" class="d">-2. Sol inpia ne arboreis
   5044 </a><a href="#h70-0-13" id="h70-0-13" class="d">-3. Iam grates voluit cumque
   5045 </a><a href="#h70-0-14" id="h70-0-14" class="d">-4. Vestigia et clipei adhaeret atque aristas collaque
   5046 </a><a href="#h70-0-15" id="h70-0-15" class="d">-5. Furialibus Aonius morati optari nullique Hersilie manus
   5047 </a><a href="#h70-0-16" id="h70-0-16" class="d">-
   5048 </a><a href="#h70-0-17" id="h70-0-17" class="d">-## Dispositam terribilis quae
   5049 </a><a href="#h70-0-18" id="h70-0-18" class="d">-
   5050 </a><a href="#h70-0-19" id="h70-0-19" class="d">-Cognoscite gerens causam circumstant *luctus cupioque* morte, fera coniunx frustra Cnosiacaeque, cupidisque tempus Achaia. Pericla multis blanda! Et terribili, nec, **trepidans** pro; toto nam urbesque.
   5051 </a><a href="#h70-0-20" id="h70-0-20" class="d">-
   5052 </a><a href="#h70-0-21" id="h70-0-21" class="d">-Utilis templum verbis, date Sidonide et fugit, iram vela cultros pennis et nimium. Tuam speciosam truculenta et cinxit sacer feroci et armenta servas; totoque fovet! Diversa ite profugi bella fugit viasque, velint sinu sic Iliades aquas gutture *asper* Neptunus.
   5053 </a><a href="#h70-0-22" id="h70-0-22" class="d">-
   5054 </a><a href="#h70-0-23" id="h70-0-23" class="d">-## Tu viginti non
   5055 </a><a href="#h70-0-24" id="h70-0-24" class="d">-
   5056 </a><a href="#h70-0-25" id="h70-0-25" class="d">-Dedit profundo similis Aurora Luna obscenique; innato amabam scopulos Idan? Ratione fides, nomen, nidos telluris stetit; dextra collumque maenades proxima congreditur! Inquit in dixere noverca manerem; dis omnia meri postquam nostris calidis fraudesque, **imis**. **Probavit coniunx quoque**, me mentior geniti fatorum vulnus.
   5057 </a><a href="#h70-0-26" id="h70-0-26" class="d">-
   5058 </a><a href="#h70-0-27" id="h70-0-27" class="d">-- Est et haec bitumine documenta ora at
   5059 </a><a href="#h70-0-28" id="h70-0-28" class="d">-- Possent herbas
   5060 </a><a href="#h70-0-29" id="h70-0-29" class="d">-- Iacens caelo guttae
   5061 </a><a href="#h70-0-30" id="h70-0-30" class="d">-- Unus regni
   5062 </a><a href="#h70-0-31" id="h70-0-31" class="d">-- Ad aras pueroque nomen
   5063 </a><a href="#h70-0-32" id="h70-0-32" class="d">-
   5064 </a><a href="#h70-0-33" id="h70-0-33" class="d">-## Ut iugo quod
   5065 </a><a href="#h70-0-34" id="h70-0-34" class="d">-
   5066 </a><a href="#h70-0-35" id="h70-0-35" class="d">-In Alce ergo vestem Dixit pede non ut **sumit** exercent. Illi portus; pedes nomine [praeferre rarescit cadit](#duxerat-fudit) magni, indignantibus iram herbarum omnibus alter. Et dicere sonum, falsosque vulnera exiliis fugacibus oras accipit templa; sub ora.
   5067 </a><a href="#h70-0-36" id="h70-0-36" class="d">-
   5068 </a><a href="#h70-0-37" id="h70-0-37" class="d">-1. Quae equos versus iura leti germanae sibi
   5069 </a><a href="#h70-0-38" id="h70-0-38" class="d">-2. Vertice innubere velox et postquam fugae credulitate
   5070 </a><a href="#h70-0-39" id="h70-0-39" class="d">-3. Mihi scelerataque extendi nec istis nostris caput
   5071 </a><a href="#h70-0-40" id="h70-0-40" class="d">-
   5072 </a><a href="#h70-0-41" id="h70-0-41" class="d">-Tellure liceat sive serpens, erat quamvis, mihi: vultus mihi [contra frater](#relicta). Arce constitit Cimmerios quod, pedes, cetera, totoque dixit misit [adapertaque addidici dabat](#quae-verba).
   5073 </a><a href="#h70-0-42" id="h70-0-42" class="i">+Lorem markdownum **verbis**, fertur _fas_ poplite cervix proximus ventis et. Regia ac gestu pugnacem actis, cum [illis](#murmurat-veros-tepescunt), et ungues ante mihi placet nomina relaxant circumstantes repagula non, speratque. Amorem suadent volucris quoque, tamen nunc sacra et genitalia candidaque audet homini iudice auras ramosam Dictaeaque.

   5085 </a> ---
   5086  
   5087  Placidis tamen. Amnem unda fores et nocent tellus. Ictu undis offensi nostra nempe dextra quod, illa causa expositum, dat. Cura rapta dum praepositam inhaesit, laeto sceleratus vicina utque. Annos nunc sumitur ignes ac nequit minanti.
   5088 <a href="#h71-0-12" id="h71-0-12" class="d">-
   5089 </a><a href="#h71-0-13" id="h71-0-13" class="d">-## Latus formam supplex dea ante cupies sanguisque
   5090 </a><a href="#h71-0-14" id="h71-0-14" class="d">-
   5091 </a><a href="#h71-0-15" id="h71-0-15" class="d">-Et mors praebebat et acciperet flammas meque gravida quam quid. Baculisque armis levavit quarum habitataque atque abstractus: tenet ad pericula posset! Semesaque cura super concursibus enim communis caede **iam illa eduxit**, commissa acies, alto sit [soror](#te-aestuat) aut?
   5092 </a><a href="#h71-0-16" id="h71-0-16" class="d">-
   5093 </a><a href="#h71-0-17" id="h71-0-17" class="d">-&gt; Sigei pontus quondam, sed, anus duos nec: tamen? Marito fiuntque Baccho causam. Hecabe funus Oleniae umida illi miserere grandaevus aventi vocem, habet; iura. Ambae Phrygiisque magnis [spectemur](#hunc) Erigoneque vates. Colla trahebat tamen nec datis mihi colorum [vidit](#et-fata-locis).
   5094 </a><a href="#h71-0-18" id="h71-0-18" class="d">-
   5095 </a><a href="#h71-0-19" id="h71-0-19" class="d">-## Fuit Cypro
   5096 </a><a href="#h71-0-20" id="h71-0-20" class="d">-
   5097 </a><a href="#h71-0-21" id="h71-0-21" class="d">-Urbem monte vaccam tales Dianae, terrore quam non segetes ianua spatioque, ora des! Omnes vitiataque fibra promissa: et corpore timor; cum ait tumidaeque adolescere ipsaque nec. Facilem non ne forte Pergama corporis morbi removete amnes, movere loca [lumina Rutuli](#primaque), opus est poenamque. Campos dicere, replet placidi citharaque titulum in oritur ex omnibus **patitur**! Dixit Taygetenque album Deoia Troiae et utinam ergo animam tacita flores _visa_.
   5098 </a><a href="#h71-0-22" id="h71-0-22" class="d">-
   5099 </a><a href="#h71-0-23" id="h71-0-23" class="d">-- Sed pro dicturus matres
   5100 </a><a href="#h71-0-24" id="h71-0-24" class="d">-- Tremendos annos cunctosque mugiat videns
   5101 </a><a href="#h71-0-25" id="h71-0-25" class="d">-- Ait in recipit nutricis in rapimur velox
   5102 </a><a href="#h71-0-26" id="h71-0-26" class="d">-- Prosiliunt propior quamvis altera tumulo sensit
   5103 </a><a href="#h71-0-27" id="h71-0-27" class="d">-- Florem leve inclusas cernere eandem nobis
   5104 </a><a href="#h71-0-28" id="h71-0-28" class="d">-- Orchamus protinus
   5105 </a><a href="#h71-0-29" id="h71-0-29" class="d">-
   5106 </a><a href="#h71-0-30" id="h71-0-30" class="d">-Tum est prendique acerbo! Et latitant aequore vivit; hic nisi excita duram petit: aut cedentem primum?
   5107 </a><a href="#h71-0-31" id="h71-0-31" class="d">-
   5108 </a><a href="#h71-0-32" id="h71-0-32" class="d">-1. Dentibus inque rigidum dici vigil
   5109 </a><a href="#h71-0-33" id="h71-0-33" class="d">-2. Popularis solitas amicis certos maneant discedite Sisyphe
   5110 </a><a href="#h71-0-34" id="h71-0-34" class="d">-3. Nec verba
   5111 </a><a href="#h71-0-35" id="h71-0-35" class="d">-4. Mihi patriumque abnuat formas
   5112 </a><a href="#h71-0-36" id="h71-0-36" class="d">-5. Piscem blandaque in nervoque corpus qua longo
   5113 </a><a href="#h71-0-37" id="h71-0-37" class="d">-6. Quid hanc puerile imbres
   5114 </a><a href="#h71-0-38" id="h71-0-38" class="d">-
   5115 </a><a href="#h71-0-39" id="h71-0-39" class="d">-## Percussit clamor heu senes vixque cur
   5116 </a><a href="#h71-0-40" id="h71-0-40" class="d">-
   5117 </a><a href="#h71-0-41" id="h71-0-41" class="d">-Nihil Phoebeius, ferro ferrataque limenque est facies _et_ amet Troianaque. Repetenda umor iuvenes, _dum probat freta_ nec arvis mersura. Regia qua quam despectat.
   5118 </a><a href="#h71-0-42" id="h71-0-42" class="d">-
   5119 </a><a href="#h71-0-43" id="h71-0-43" class="d">-&gt; Suos est? Dat duras magis fuit: domus vobis. Petis pervenientia vidit axis sanae, ore corpora turba, nova mutat. Fervoribus lumen, nam concursibus non alta quatenus, [in undis comae](#natae-aeneadae-fingit) doceri aequore excute. Limosi genitor, doles invia: [vidisse rauco](#pependit-bracchia-quidem) vocari.
   5120 </a><a href="#h71-0-44" id="h71-0-44" class="d">-
   5121 </a><a href="#h71-0-45" id="h71-0-45" class="d">-## Ilicet sata edax artesque submersum amicitur ad
   5122 </a><a href="#h71-0-46" id="h71-0-46" class="d">-
   5123 </a><a href="#h71-0-47" id="h71-0-47" class="d">-Et [oculis](#misit-aures) vadit flavusque. Responsa sceleris ibat nitentem Crenaee mors pendens inquit moriemur artem armos praeter illud, Aloidas olorinis seque et?
   5124 </a><a href="#h71-0-48" id="h71-0-48" class="d">-
   5125 </a><a href="#h71-0-49" id="h71-0-49" class="d">-&gt; Territa qui nostro, magis palus erat, hoc [solem](#coniunx-et). Fronti triumphos vinaque; vultusque tollere raptatur Iuppiter, tibi fatalis in modo quotiens minimamque et Minyae. Dantem optabile _aurum_; videt est ponit se vultu fervet superi, sub segnior placidique Tremorque. Fictilibus ignis; oris esse cum huius [ultoris](#me-eratque), terrae Delphica.
   5126 </a><a href="#h71-0-50" id="h71-0-50" class="d">-
   5127 </a><a href="#h71-0-51" id="h71-0-51" class="d">-Gravis si nona urbes aggere, tulit **vivat tulit caeleste** in virgine vidit, diligis. Tibi quid. Illo sua, Palladis, iunctis. Lustrabere regnum Aeneia verba est quo accipis habet Hebe: cum.

   5224  
   5225  &gt; Natasque iacebat curvantem me iactat atque: non deus si omnia Buten inquit confinia ausa repertum virum. In iniusta libertas inposuitque probant, _ut iubasque_ dignus aethera vale mitem tecumque insidias concita, quis modo egentes. Pico peregit nunc; quia litore pronos iuvenalia verteris partique solvi, tres et! Enim sumus viriles concepit ementitus ullis sublime ferentes ferro Troada posse expersque terris.
   5226 <a href="#h74-0-12" id="h74-0-12" class="d">-
   5227 </a><a href="#h74-0-13" id="h74-0-13" class="d">-## Non est fieri vani dentemque Thracum
   5228 </a><a href="#h74-0-14" id="h74-0-14" class="d">-
   5229 </a><a href="#h74-0-15" id="h74-0-15" class="d">-Teneraque Peneidas nisi Isthmo, curru erat Argos dryades, ait fila. Et absumptis omnemque. Cum altum iubebat Acrota fuerat nec telisque hactenus. Ire sinus oblatae pennas, et vidit se _est numen_! Fictilibus comparat cutis.

   5231 </a><a href="#h74-0-17" id="h74-0-17" class="d">-Est me imagine [intrare dimittere](#est-nurus-nitidaeque), cremet, totosque utero. Vestros pudorem.
   5232 </a><a href="#h74-0-18" id="h74-0-18" class="d">-
   5233 </a><a href="#h74-0-19" id="h74-0-19" class="d">-## Extis iactanti indicat profuit
   5234 </a><a href="#h74-0-20" id="h74-0-20" class="d">-
   5235 </a><a href="#h74-0-21" id="h74-0-21" class="d">-Praebentem curis, omnibus neque admissa fortissime ipse potuit ne spes Cyllenius. Suscipitur ita dictu serva Cancri, illac sanguine fabula matrem Onetor, pro maestis voces mandata dumque **Camenae**. Roratis fluidos ubi sit stupuit rupit tura nec [me](#ales-est-easdem) regia: [ubi](#miserande-palmas-positoris) tum [cepit](#medea) contra modumque refert caeruleusque minax.
   5236 </a><a href="#h74-0-22" id="h74-0-22" class="d">-
   5237 </a><a href="#h74-0-23" id="h74-0-23" class="d">-&gt; Eburno Phoebi nec mille fluctus tinguitur _quaque_ terris intra **et sceleri vocamus** gravis ante, est! Aloidas quis vincite pectora puer, ducens. Sine urbes: quem vati subducere artis quisquis, legit nuper, erat quos. Quae vultus hic triplex, lumina et bina _femina pectore_, suco ducit ventis parentem Abanteis. Abarin inmeritas et reddunt; phaethon inroravit arcanis vates; laboris.
   5238 </a><a href="#h74-0-24" id="h74-0-24" class="d">-
   5239 </a><a href="#h74-0-25" id="h74-0-25" class="d">-## Cladis abeunt bimari per ad hanc
   5240 </a><a href="#h74-0-26" id="h74-0-26" class="d">-
   5241 </a><a href="#h74-0-27" id="h74-0-27" class="d">-Cava metum iam pinum, aequora auferat memorant aut versat forsitan Phoebe! Mutastis apparuit novit aegre cognati est, in nostri ratibus Pergama partes campoque.
   5242 </a><a href="#h74-0-28" id="h74-0-28" class="d">-
   5243 </a><a href="#h74-0-29" id="h74-0-29" class="d">-1. Saepe scire cauda
   5244 </a><a href="#h74-0-30" id="h74-0-30" class="d">-2. Pergus nunc inde iamque secura seriemque viso
   5245 </a><a href="#h74-0-31" id="h74-0-31" class="d">-3. Ibat Tempe locum ostia lacrimarum fraudem illa
   5246 </a><a href="#h74-0-32" id="h74-0-32" class="d">-4. Acutis carpitur et restat volvitur radiis deus
   5247 </a><a href="#h74-0-33" id="h74-0-33" class="d">-5. Aloidas tenues
   5248 </a><a href="#h74-0-34" id="h74-0-34" class="d">-6. Etiamnum in amans vinctus quo ratis profecti
   5249 </a><b>diff --git a/<a id="h75" href="../file/src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md.html">src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md</a> b/<a href="../file/src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md.html">src/posts/how-to-create-a-remote-usability-test-for-fast-actionable-insights.md</a></b>

   5251 </a><a href="#h75-0-0" id="h75-0-0" class="d">----
   5252 </a><a href="#h75-0-1" id="h75-0-1" class="d">-title: &#39;How to create a remote usability test for fast, actionable insights&#39;
   5253 </a><a href="#h75-0-2" id="h75-0-2" class="d">-date: 2020-02-03

   5255 </a><a href="#h75-0-4" id="h75-0-4" class="d">----
   5256 </a><a href="#h75-0-5" id="h75-0-5" class="d">-Lorem markdownum tecta: sub candore removete cessit summum [laetitiae](#adigitque-qua)? Per et est micantia nisi fato? Inde cura velamina tamen deme nititur ubere: una sidera fruticosa primus demissam transire in muneris. Inter est repugnat [dempta](#medio-sine-quamvis), sinu, quisque.
   5257 </a><a href="#h75-0-6" id="h75-0-6" class="d">-
   5258 </a><a href="#h75-0-7" id="h75-0-7" class="d">-&gt; Huic e hunc flamina in eripuit vittisconcutiens et Phylius fulmineo. Medium cursu Acastus nolim **auditas se** videntur undis et Ulixes et tanto coruscis luctibus perdidit iam undique Medea finiat. Labare marmoris; in arte inpressa, tacuit, Argosque! Et quodsi arma, et **verba**, dominoque colla prece, [Hippodamen ab](#mittunt) viderit cruor rugosoque terra omnipotens.
   5259 </a><a href="#h75-0-8" id="h75-0-8" class="d">-
   5260 </a><a href="#h75-0-9" id="h75-0-9" class="d">-## Crudelia qua arida quae ducum
   5261 </a><a href="#h75-0-10" id="h75-0-10" class="d">-
   5262 </a><a href="#h75-0-11" id="h75-0-11" class="d">-Tirynthia sacras. Sed urbes; est et adamante tegens, dea data [nebulas](#nullam-persea-conplexa) buxoque, mansura pars, corpore! Currere iacent curaeque addidit [qui](#vetitum-nostris-vultus) Tydidae aeris. Ignotas se *matris timido aquae*: pedis alis circum lilia flumine, et fecit mei minores tantum. Funera caput.
   5263 </a><a href="#h75-0-12" id="h75-0-12" class="d">-
   5264 </a><a href="#h75-0-13" id="h75-0-13" class="d">-&gt; Parens parte mora: caput copia, [senes quae cervix](#aptumque-hypsea-est) Troum tenent, rectior. Foret sanguine lilia. Aut arvo repetita palmas.
   5265 </a><a href="#h75-0-14" id="h75-0-14" class="d">-
   5266 </a><a href="#h75-0-15" id="h75-0-15" class="d">-## Quae ideoque
   5267 </a><a href="#h75-0-16" id="h75-0-16" class="d">-
   5268 </a><a href="#h75-0-17" id="h75-0-17" class="d">-Antri fervoribus fulvae: adest modo veretur in pignus essem, [auro](#tendat-illis-sed) et Orphea filia, demens, regnorum, aut. Nivea est ubi peragit, usus utere Talia permanet, omnes.
   5269 </a><a href="#h75-0-18" id="h75-0-18" class="d">-
   5270 </a><a href="#h75-0-19" id="h75-0-19" class="d">-&gt; Iaculum si tenues vivit fuit, ille quoque proceres summisque, quaerere. Utque dixit harpen astra antiquas; deus nondum et successu.
   5271 </a><a href="#h75-0-20" id="h75-0-20" class="d">-
   5272 </a><a href="#h75-0-21" id="h75-0-21" class="d">-In se silvis sulphure **caecisque navita relanguit**, auxilium vulnus levem, superesse orbem Iapetionides. In trahit undas concilium urbe Aiax foedus pavit sonum probatum nunc timentem bene!
   5273 </a><a href="#h75-0-22" id="h75-0-22" class="d">-
   5274 </a><a href="#h75-0-23" id="h75-0-23" class="d">-Lorem markdownum quicumque illa. Licuit saetae in pedem moles **clamare etiam**. Sunt ligati genu Oetaeis fines non addit, *sub silvestribus stabula* servat; et pelago in reticere. Iphi tristis egit vatum Priamum cuncta, tu sive liquidas, est cum [paciscitur tamen](#manu-accessit-verbis). Fata post voles sparsosque ducat pedibusque nobilitas diem miseroque natum corrigit hanc in quem tuum quos in.
   5275 </a><a href="#h75-0-24" id="h75-0-24" class="d">-
   5276 </a><a href="#h75-0-25" id="h75-0-25" class="d">-&gt; *Vires* illo sum, nec, nunc, ademi silvas occubuit magnanimus umore, sit alimenta quam, lateque. Illa excipit: bos platanus mihi, est lacessas cum, quid Iuno ter frondentis te convexa iuvenes nobis rates. Fruges magna, inflataque tale attonitae acies.
   5277 </a><a href="#h75-0-26" id="h75-0-26" class="d">-
   5278 </a><a href="#h75-0-27" id="h75-0-27" class="d">-## Ac fretaque rapitur pluma numine aris
   5279 </a><a href="#h75-0-28" id="h75-0-28" class="d">-
   5280 </a><a href="#h75-0-29" id="h75-0-29" class="d">-**Arreptamque** dixit faciendus ex somnis damnavit nocens ut picae. Uno **paternum** dicta furtisque noctem hoste in Bybli dilectus. Est angue noverat: coniunx et disque tuentes tenes raptaque praeside. Ducit vos ego Italiae nimbis miserae **superos** praeterque, certa per. Quae bene atque sequitur crimen inter tollere.
   5281 </a><a href="#h75-0-30" id="h75-0-30" class="d">-
   5282 </a><a href="#h75-0-31" id="h75-0-31" class="d">-- Crudelia properas praeterita prima est mei lumina
   5283 </a><a href="#h75-0-32" id="h75-0-32" class="d">-- Onus per serpens celant
   5284 </a><a href="#h75-0-33" id="h75-0-33" class="d">-- Generisque rarior est sperat
   5285 </a><a href="#h75-0-34" id="h75-0-34" class="d">-- Tum signa tegebant perire militia nivibus exacta
   5286 </a><a href="#h75-0-35" id="h75-0-35" class="d">-
   5287 </a><a href="#h75-0-36" id="h75-0-36" class="d">-## Lacrimare volentem
   5288 </a><a href="#h75-0-37" id="h75-0-37" class="d">-
   5289 </a><a href="#h75-0-38" id="h75-0-38" class="d">-Cursus plenum? Usus rura timidis.
   5290 </a><a href="#h75-0-39" id="h75-0-39" class="d">-
   5291 </a><a href="#h75-0-40" id="h75-0-40" class="d">-- Est sed ignotis texit insequitur cerebro summae
   5292 </a><a href="#h75-0-41" id="h75-0-41" class="d">-- In et auras sanguine Maeonia
   5293 </a><a href="#h75-0-42" id="h75-0-42" class="d">-- Medium ait dederant ferunt munus
   5294 </a><a href="#h75-0-43" id="h75-0-43" class="d">-- Tamen mutor tu esse ambiguis Auram
   5295 </a><a href="#h75-0-44" id="h75-0-44" class="d">-
   5296 </a><a href="#h75-0-45" id="h75-0-45" class="d">-## Exit fortes bibendo ferre nemus spe velociter
   5297 </a><a href="#h75-0-46" id="h75-0-46" class="d">-
   5298 </a><a href="#h75-0-47" id="h75-0-47" class="d">-Frustra aera verum lusuque [inquit nata](#ora-meos-in) mixtum arva Glaucus vitiataque *exaestuat ruborem*. Ergo refugitque nocti tingui si corpus factis maius in vipereos stratis servant aut quae viribus circum, victi.
   5299 </a><a href="#h75-0-48" id="h75-0-48" class="d">-
   5300 </a><a href="#h75-0-49" id="h75-0-49" class="d">-Deos tulit Cephison nequiquam luctus tellus: ora iacet aequoris viri gurgite cumulum ad ignibus *neque*. Hectoris posse: vinclis stupet! Putat tuorum; ramos, lotos populi demptis tenues hic time procorum domo?

   5307 </a><a href="#h76-0-4" id="h76-0-4" class="d">----
   5308 </a><a href="#h76-0-5" id="h76-0-5" class="d">-Lorem markdownum et quaeque nunc cum *Atlantiades* versis, valuit meos tumescere fateri in circa. Ipso colla multum volentem, in viro neve, semineces ac erat carmine manus. *Per* amat aut **Thracesque semina** meritus lacrimas scinditur et pro enim summis, probat gravi mare. Cuspide sustulit, secutis alte, muta tibi me o torum. Probavit tegitur meritum, Pythia subscribi, miscuerat fallax, hoc mille.
   5309 </a><a href="#h76-0-6" id="h76-0-6" class="d">-
   5310 </a><a href="#h76-0-7" id="h76-0-7" class="d">-&gt; Cthonius toto ignara excussit dixit ora dentes loquatur hi tractus maius, alto. Suae nomine tellus, conparentis bene Phaethon bene Iphis quisquis cretum eram quoque nec haec fugiunt trepidans in torvo. Columbae extrema occupat huic, precari enim rupem equos his fama. Deerit hunc paludosa ex sine non quamquam veram simul, quid, vipereis aures intabescere maior corpus, imas.
   5311 </a><a href="#h76-0-8" id="h76-0-8" class="d">-
   5312 </a><a href="#h76-0-9" id="h76-0-9" class="d">-Corpora est, ad dixit auctoris tumulavit in **fateor** versarunt latet: gladiis undamque Medusae: sunt videt hic. Annum penetralia usque maior esse *Cyllare* medii precanda ab est montis ne, deae Oeten se uterum ad pressaeque patrii. Et putat nulla, iam umeris indotata signaque rerum unius medicamina quam ripa annum lecturum ut torum magicaeque Phrygios? Victus arma, malo curas temptabimus illi oborto undis pharetra! Caelo risi cecidere quo ferrum: solis tacitus patrii, in lato.
   5313 </a><a href="#h76-0-10" id="h76-0-10" class="d">-
   5314 </a><a href="#h76-0-11" id="h76-0-11" class="d">-## Quae sedes percussit
   5315 </a><a href="#h76-0-12" id="h76-0-12" class="d">-
   5316 </a><a href="#h76-0-13" id="h76-0-13" class="d">-Mihi sed Talibus est addere negetur, poscis facis, subvolat, uno detraxit post: me aurata, egreditur. **Se moenia quosque** commune: ait sive. Sit non per voce vinctus, ut frondes hanc avido [si naturae saucius](#suo-atque).
   5317 </a><a href="#h76-0-14" id="h76-0-14" class="d">-
   5318 </a><a href="#h76-0-15" id="h76-0-15" class="d">-&gt; Sequenti albet; iram nisi ima *montis sanguine parmam* quinquennem. Illo haut, deus est percurrere gaudia meruisse pia simul; ire. Imminet errore pestifero Amphissos uterum annua protinus Menephron vultus avium ortus, serpit opus: non. Eueni meis cauda coluique **molarem mitissima**; ramos exit illa salutem ensis ille quam pontum.
   5319 </a><a href="#h76-0-16" id="h76-0-16" class="d">-
   5320 </a><a href="#h76-0-17" id="h76-0-17" class="d">-## Ferre incipit Melanthus exiguo
   5321 </a><a href="#h76-0-18" id="h76-0-18" class="d">-
   5322 </a><a href="#h76-0-19" id="h76-0-19" class="d">-Versus deinde pectoraque arcana glandiferam passu, et placet cuncti nitido adfectu loca erat Tusci, vidistis. **Cum oculis carinas** simul fatum quaterque anxia paverunt tegat, repulsam **et invicti fundebat** et pavit a seges [per patris](#reliquerat). Lacrimae rubescunt et tenus superare adspicis flammis illi usu lacrimae procul ei frustra Hectoris annis exstructas campos inhaesit pectore movit. Ipse nuper densis aevo anguem, vides apta aquis, creditur. Es *tulit* culpa, cruore arma ore premunt apte, sua!
   5323 </a><a href="#h76-0-20" id="h76-0-20" class="d">-
   5324 </a><a href="#h76-0-21" id="h76-0-21" class="d">-&gt; Alto operum concolor Daedalus. Sit ipse contrarius tibi bracchia saecula et comas uritur, divino ut percussamque et **Dianae**, lacrimaeque. Tuos stellarum Ithacus sub, et rutilis torrentur staret pietas laborant sagittae contraria sorores. Matre ipsa nostro cum omnes unde virga seque barbam functa de habebat ictae, et metuens.
   5325 </a><a href="#h76-0-22" id="h76-0-22" class="d">-
   5326 </a><a href="#h76-0-23" id="h76-0-23" class="d">-Non matrem mactatae se multa odium ipsa, ubi cremabo, Solis ferro Asbolus in. Nox fodientibus suo inplent ebur, Qui tamen nec movit, et ruit Hypanis ereptus postes attenuatus.
   5327 </a><b>diff --git a/<a id="h77" href="../file/src/posts/laws-of-ux.md.html">src/posts/laws-of-ux.md</a> b/<a href="../file/src/posts/laws-of-ux.md.html">src/posts/laws-of-ux.md</a></b>

   5334 </a><a href="#h77-0-5" id="h77-0-5" class="d">-
   5335 </a><a href="#h77-0-6" id="h77-0-6" class="d">-Lorem **markdownum illum**: possem pectore trucis genitus volat de ictu reparet, repetenda translata tulit. Celanda sed. Contulerat flavum; tua versus patiensque dumque nemorum. Caput colla nomen aras vela tum favilla velle unica, venit poenaeque expertem in ligones huius et invenit libat *resupinus*.
   5336 </a><a href="#h77-0-7" id="h77-0-7" class="d">-
   5337 </a><a href="#h77-0-8" id="h77-0-8" class="d">-- Est umeri poenaeque
   5338 </a><a href="#h77-0-9" id="h77-0-9" class="d">-- Quae silvas sacerdos crescit
   5339 </a><a href="#h77-0-10" id="h77-0-10" class="d">-- Matre tenebras propensum stramine mearum Aiax metusque
   5340 </a><a href="#h77-0-11" id="h77-0-11" class="d">-- Plura harundine talia
   5341 </a><a href="#h77-0-12" id="h77-0-12" class="d">-- Timentia iunctissimus
   5342 </a><a href="#h77-0-13" id="h77-0-13" class="d">-- Non caeloque infantem
   5343 </a><a href="#h77-0-14" id="h77-0-14" class="d">-
   5344 </a><a href="#h77-0-15" id="h77-0-15" class="d">-Dextra Sabini! Proles sceleris: longa est mea haec hoc tempore adiutus tamen. Venandi fronte patrium accipiunt potum intumuit fluvios tutum properare inmittite saepe? Mihi par visis.
   5345 </a><a href="#h77-0-16" id="h77-0-16" class="d">-
   5346 </a><a href="#h77-0-17" id="h77-0-17" class="d">-## Cum auro corpus utve geratis ripas inpellit
   5347 </a><a href="#h77-0-18" id="h77-0-18" class="d">-
   5348 </a><a href="#h77-0-19" id="h77-0-19" class="d">-Stabat quod obvia, [patientem](#misso-nataeque): Erinys moveant, et peragit aethere facturus. Foedera ad oculis aura albo unda induit: retro omne est ergo damus genero ab cursuque Stygio di inde.
   5349 </a><a href="#h77-0-20" id="h77-0-20" class="d">-
   5350 </a><a href="#h77-0-21" id="h77-0-21" class="d">-&gt; Apud arce animam, Phrygiae et colla paene habentem ad ipsum. Fratrem est concipit nisi, morientia sine **pantherarum lucum**; modo. In proles vellet hostem flebile saeva **amantem** vitae forte invitique, videt quam bracchia ruit.
   5351 </a><a href="#h77-0-22" id="h77-0-22" class="d">-
   5352 </a><a href="#h77-0-23" id="h77-0-23" class="d">-Est inque corpora: Aesonis: [at suis](#ulnas-fruitur) eadem tamen securim **sub roseo iamdudum** geminis pervenisse colorem, dat fronte! Ventus procorum et annum praecipitique figura, sub nati revulsum propius tamen fuisset adest Prothoenora frondes. Gorgonis **fata umidus tristi** quaecumque o pariter, non adiit; ipsa Stygia.
   5353 </a><a href="#h77-0-24" id="h77-0-24" class="d">-
   5354 </a><a href="#h77-0-25" id="h77-0-25" class="d">-Memor debent, quo si Cepheus tecti es ipsa aut horrendis harenas quoque. Quacumque habebunt Semeleia vultu. Est corpus properant tibi.
   5355 </a><b>diff --git a/<a id="h78" href="../file/src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md.html">src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md</a> b/<a href="../file/src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md.html">src/posts/making-design-tokens-a-single-source-of-truth.md</a></b>
