   5359 </a><a href="#h78-0-2" id="h78-0-2" class="d">-date: 2019-12-21
   5360 </a><a href="#h78-0-3" id="h78-0-3" class="d">-tags: &#39;Design Systems&#39;
   5361 </a><a href="#h78-0-4" id="h78-0-4" class="d">----
   5362 </a><a href="#h78-0-5" id="h78-0-5" class="d">-Lorem markdownum, bracchia iuvenis teneo, nec urget, iuvenum nec adusque. Quaerit laborum parientibus inde eloquitur impune passu coronam sed maritae oculis, valuissent ne breve novis. Nec aliena facies agros sub cupiunt Credulitas, alumnus sermonibus, medium, gemellos. Sibi nec videbor negabat; et etiam offensi amnis interea donec sanguis forsitan descenderat nempe altior!
   5363 </a><a href="#h78-0-6" id="h78-0-6" class="d">-
   5364 </a><a href="#h78-0-7" id="h78-0-7" class="d">-1. Litora optasse visa tellus
   5365 </a><a href="#h78-0-8" id="h78-0-8" class="d">-2. Lacrimante corripitur frustra conveniunt colla est inridet
   5366 </a><a href="#h78-0-9" id="h78-0-9" class="d">-3. Super poscis
   5367 </a><a href="#h78-0-10" id="h78-0-10" class="d">-4. Ne velamina suos iuventus
   5368 </a><a href="#h78-0-11" id="h78-0-11" class="d">-
   5369 </a><a href="#h78-0-12" id="h78-0-12" class="d">-## Et murmur summa Titan esto ut opprimere
   5370 </a><a href="#h78-0-13" id="h78-0-13" class="d">-
   5371 </a><a href="#h78-0-14" id="h78-0-14" class="d">-Referens timeas fides, haut sic vultusque, culpa latitantem in eadem, ossa dubitat. *Atracides et imber* vires dies placuere indignatus ardetque exire. His summa flexerat perit! Pro partu suorum ille; populos lacu positaeque vocant regia puerpera valentes o pes. Cereris rerum cornua pavet Alemoniden vitae pereunt laetum.
   5372 </a><a href="#h78-0-15" id="h78-0-15" class="d">-
   5373 </a><a href="#h78-0-16" id="h78-0-16" class="d">-## Sit potuit sinus Achille tortum
   5374 </a><a href="#h78-0-17" id="h78-0-17" class="d">-
   5375 </a><a href="#h78-0-18" id="h78-0-18" class="d">-Cauda corpore leto curas tamen pluma, ipse *fecundus*, nihil viris cuspide convivia sanctaque. Spectatae inpetus patulo faciendus Tethys festumque exterrita nota, litora paventis inque; hic? Ingemit et frontes tumefactum hanc, nil perque stetit, factas adductaque cubilia anno, **sanguinis**: munus **postquam**? Stuppea illa cretus? Et gaudia et moras male defecta aquarum et grates conbibitur Mendesius thyrso ausus!
   5376 </a><a href="#h78-0-19" id="h78-0-19" class="d">-
   5377 </a><a href="#h78-0-20" id="h78-0-20" class="d">-Umida infamia colorum ille lacrimas, et gaudet erat hasta. Iudicis orant haerentes et, ad messes **etenim** veneni abit pendens imitatur dixit. Unum et alite ecce quoque hamo vult etiam in nigrae. Pater cava, multicavo portasse habet, nullus rem inpulsu ense nec albentia.
   5378 </a><a href="#h78-0-21" id="h78-0-21" class="d">-
   5379 </a><a href="#h78-0-22" id="h78-0-22" class="d">-## Generi iactanti tibi medio conposuit inferias quibus
   5380 </a><a href="#h78-0-23" id="h78-0-23" class="d">-
   5381 </a><a href="#h78-0-24" id="h78-0-24" class="d">-Nec est attigimus data, nec et territus quicquam cibique [inundet sepulcro](#inpono), adiecerit. Totiens nutrici nec sanguine favore speculatur Cicones Delphice; ore sine lumina.
   5382 </a><a href="#h78-0-25" id="h78-0-25" class="d">-
   5383 </a><a href="#h78-0-26" id="h78-0-26" class="d">-Sic inde molle gradientis verum, amoris Cypron plurimus toris **dea semideique** fiducia malis motibus, is, est. Aera lingua sequerere mille lintea eadem nodosaque potest sedisti vocatur. Nomine non haec, posse nota foedera sopita. Sed animoque felix videtur *aequoreae at* quae, haustus tu inrita oculos. Quam lumbis dictis, accensae sole manu in illi strepitum videar.
   5384 </a><a href="#h78-0-27" id="h78-0-27" class="d">-
   5385 </a><a href="#h78-0-28" id="h78-0-28" class="d">-Gestae **ferre mecum fata** spatium, est acta ieiunia sperat praecipue habuere. Proteu esse secedit fata hac suis: ieiunia [recens](#una). Thisbaeas lateri rogus natalibus noverca dextraque sparsae: a rore, quae veste Gyaros fluminis *cervixque nec*, coeperunt.
   5386 </a><b>diff --git a/<a id="h79" href="../file/src/posts/posts.json.html">src/posts/posts.json</a> b/<a href="../file/src/posts/posts.json.html">src/posts/posts.json</a></b>
   5387 <a href="#h79-0" id="h79-0" class="h">@@ -1,3 +1,4 @@
   5388 </a> {
   5389 <a href="#h79-0-1" id="h79-0-1" class="d">-    &quot;layout&quot;: &quot;layouts/post.njk&quot;
   5390 </a><a href="#h79-0-2" id="h79-0-2" class="i">+    &quot;layout&quot;: &quot;layouts/post.njk&quot;,
   5391 </a><a href="#h79-0-3" id="h79-0-3" class="i">+    &quot;permalink&quot;: &quot;/blog/{{ title | slug }}/index.html&quot;
   5392 </a> }

   5396 </a><a href="#h80-0-0" id="h80-0-0" class="d">----
   5397 </a><a href="#h80-0-1" id="h80-0-1" class="d">-title: &#39;Quick and simple image placeholder&#39;
   5398 </a><a href="#h80-0-2" id="h80-0-2" class="d">-date: 2019-09-28
   5399 </a><a href="#h80-0-3" id="h80-0-3" class="d">-tags: [&#39;Tips And Tricks&#39;]
   5400 </a><a href="#h80-0-4" id="h80-0-4" class="d">----
   5401 </a><a href="#h80-0-5" id="h80-0-5" class="d">-
   5402 </a><a href="#h80-0-6" id="h80-0-6" class="d">-*Lorem markdownum* clamor, ver gemitus numen se dura mortalia inquit, sine telum durata licet teretes delphina, ex! Et genus. Amissum quam genus ambieratque messes; et Ithacus bracchia; ergo famuli inquit Lyncidae ex vestibus premebat. Rogis crimine nunc hae falsaque, dignus.
   5403 </a><a href="#h80-0-7" id="h80-0-7" class="d">-
   5404 </a><a href="#h80-0-8" id="h80-0-8" class="d">-1. Summo lucis vultus
   5405 </a><a href="#h80-0-9" id="h80-0-9" class="d">-2. Sororum esse
   5406 </a><a href="#h80-0-10" id="h80-0-10" class="d">-3. Magni exire caelestia utque totidem prisci plurima
   5407 </a><a href="#h80-0-11" id="h80-0-11" class="d">-4. Templum dolores belua aut gravis ut fraudem
   5408 </a><a href="#h80-0-12" id="h80-0-12" class="d">-5. Formam nata bracchia Cnosia amor esse coniuge
   5409 </a><a href="#h80-0-13" id="h80-0-13" class="d">-
   5410 </a><a href="#h80-0-14" id="h80-0-14" class="d">-Anxius destringere Daedale, poenae te, leti sibi novissimus astris portus pressoque me mutavit crimine, speciem in. Pariter postis, solam?
   5411 </a><a href="#h80-0-15" id="h80-0-15" class="d">-
   5412 </a><a href="#h80-0-16" id="h80-0-16" class="d">-## Graciles Lycaeo ab nihil ad avis Phoebe
   5413 </a><a href="#h80-0-17" id="h80-0-17" class="d">-
   5414 </a><a href="#h80-0-18" id="h80-0-18" class="d">-Emathion est labore vagae? Adpositi quaerunt in torvo; dei laeva similis. Enim quam agitataque Martis, una misero **sed fugam** coniecto.
   5415 </a><a href="#h80-0-19" id="h80-0-19" class="d">-
   5416 </a><a href="#h80-0-20" id="h80-0-20" class="d">-- De fitque correpto usum est fallaci medium
   5417 </a><a href="#h80-0-21" id="h80-0-21" class="d">-- Moenia sensimus vidisse calorque
   5418 </a><a href="#h80-0-22" id="h80-0-22" class="d">-- Lata tuae profugaque stetit videre haberet
   5419 </a><a href="#h80-0-23" id="h80-0-23" class="d">-- Dant manuque Icare
   5420 </a><a href="#h80-0-24" id="h80-0-24" class="d">-
   5421 </a><a href="#h80-0-25" id="h80-0-25" class="d">-Aut telum naidas ducibusque: orbem Venus latosque dicere oscula, praemia lasso indestrictus namque nec et refert Telamon. Similisque *iuvenis relanguit refert* uterum boves. Sed flenti inquit; ait iure squalidus e pennae adverso et carne haec adsunt; hoc. Solio adfectas Erymanthon eruerit tollens, **est traxit** robore at. Aras veterem virtus et ad viridi sceleratus, penitusque totum.
   5422 </a><a href="#h80-0-26" id="h80-0-26" class="d">-
   5423 </a><a href="#h80-0-27" id="h80-0-27" class="d">-Sic nec labare digitos tempore, mea, erat matri repagula pectore dona. Parvo moveri tantum! **Nec sed** est et, Nereaque et tellus sidereis nimium! Locus nam, non naribus lotos [de](#simul-tua-tenent) nivea viros merui semina leves, vobis se vallem agris et. Interea quae dixere illa, undis haec ipse sanguine moriens.
   5424 </a><a href="#h80-0-28" id="h80-0-28" class="d">-
   5425 </a><a href="#h80-0-29" id="h80-0-29" class="d">-Summae sui tentoria coercuit, ora uncis nunc, exhorruit colunt supersint spectem, Io premunt natum Oeclides Iovis. Membra volvere sororum libera murmura, habet adultera, semine finitur, te te illi pennis nomen, nec quisquis. Frustra perque, ipse membris et poma vincinaque umeris iste? Longus et a margine igitur esse, est mutavit ille abest mihi circuitu tempore possent. Ultima [silvis thalamo](#se) vestras, *quae probat* curia medium Chaonius necopina, te nostraque armos quod Colchi.
   5426 </a><b>diff --git a/<a id="h81" href="../file/src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md.html">src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md</a> b/<a href="../file/src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md.html">src/posts/typography-tips-for-the-web.md</a></b>

   5429 </a><a href="#h81-0-1" id="h81-0-1" class="d">-title: &#39;Typography tips for the web&#39;
   5430 </a><a href="#h81-0-2" id="h81-0-2" class="d">-date: 2019-12-04
   5431 </a><a href="#h81-0-3" id="h81-0-3" class="d">-tags: [&#39;Tips And Tricks&#39;]
   5432 </a><a href="#h81-0-4" id="h81-0-4" class="d">----
   5433 </a><a href="#h81-0-5" id="h81-0-5" class="d">-Lorem markdownum pectus neque! Nomen et cepit in caedis protinus, motumque aderam collumque sedem domum.
   5434 </a><a href="#h81-0-6" id="h81-0-6" class="d">-
   5435 </a><a href="#h81-0-7" id="h81-0-7" class="d">-1. Erat cervus haec
   5436 </a><a href="#h81-0-8" id="h81-0-8" class="d">-2. Inscribit maximus
   5437 </a><a href="#h81-0-9" id="h81-0-9" class="d">-3. Annos cum iuvene iustissimus pater cinctasque genetrix
   5438 </a><a href="#h81-0-10" id="h81-0-10" class="d">-
   5439 </a><a href="#h81-0-11" id="h81-0-11" class="d">-## Per ultro ortum gravidae temperat
   5440 </a><a href="#h81-0-12" id="h81-0-12" class="d">-
   5441 </a><a href="#h81-0-13" id="h81-0-13" class="d">-Ulla quod tuum **easdem** subiere, Atrides plura, Pagasaeae paret sentit. Manibusque virginis, coniugium auras: Venerem damna fugacibus cristati viget in rogos breve! O serva dolentem totidem avertitur et minus, tuens in tela boum habent leaeque. Aris aras lympha Memnonis tenebrae et nominis **fratribus** tuae premens nitore ademi ope fallaci summo, **mortisque** sanguine. Utque moras tellus frigida vestes, nec fiant manat de parenti velamina.
   5442 </a><a href="#h81-0-14" id="h81-0-14" class="d">-
   5443 </a><a href="#h81-0-15" id="h81-0-15" class="d">-1. Flammas anguis
   5444 </a><a href="#h81-0-16" id="h81-0-16" class="d">-2. Sceleratos sanguinis validi corpore dederat verbis numinis
   5445 </a><a href="#h81-0-17" id="h81-0-17" class="d">-3. Eratque mitissima
   5446 </a><a href="#h81-0-18" id="h81-0-18" class="d">-4. Carebis armis demas unus retendit
   5447 </a><a href="#h81-0-19" id="h81-0-19" class="d">-5. Fuit Iuno securi
   5448 </a><a href="#h81-0-20" id="h81-0-20" class="d">-
   5449 </a><a href="#h81-0-21" id="h81-0-21" class="d">-## Contra quasi transferre et imago quoque manu
   5450 </a><a href="#h81-0-22" id="h81-0-22" class="d">-
   5451 </a><a href="#h81-0-23" id="h81-0-23" class="d">-Transire stratis, ut **se** exiguo plenis **clarum armiger simulati** tuum. Potentior a [pavidam](#inque), inque modo colle **colubrasque porrigis** altae in aura, at attactu. Et fessis longo; abi de, egi anni, habeo pars tecta extimuit.
   5452 </a><a href="#h81-0-24" id="h81-0-24" class="d">-
   5453 </a><a href="#h81-0-25" id="h81-0-25" class="d">-Mota crimina, honor misit *amnis humo*, ter vidi medios terga, sprevere. Est nunc plangor concurrere opifer ore, eurytus tellus.
   5454 </a><a href="#h81-0-26" id="h81-0-26" class="d">-
   5455 </a><a href="#h81-0-27" id="h81-0-27" class="d">-Rurigenae Parnasia proelia confertque nostri; ore cum lanas regna! Est annis magnis protinus, Pleionesque et id longi sorte Tonantis. Et quod, est artes negarent primus, haec stipitis scopulis modo honorem has meis prius manus tempus ni foedabis.
   5456 </a><a href="#h81-0-28" id="h81-0-28" class="d">-
   5457 </a><a href="#h81-0-29" id="h81-0-29" class="d">-Repulsam iuvenum somnos percusso salutis decimum manes! Lucida et amabam date nectare concipit humano. Vidi ardet nihil faciebat saevique nitorem quoque quidem victa.
   5458 </a><b>diff --git a/<a id="h82" href="../file/src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md.html">src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md</a> b/<a href="../file/src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md.html">src/posts/why-cross-cultural-design-really-matters.md</a></b>

   5461 </a><a href="#h82-0-1" id="h82-0-1" class="d">-title: &#39;Why cross-cultural design really matters&#39;
   5462 </a><a href="#h82-0-2" id="h82-0-2" class="d">-date: 2020-04-01
   5463 </a><a href="#h82-0-3" id="h82-0-3" class="d">-tags: [&#39;Culture&#39;, &#39;Design Thinking&#39;]
   5464 </a><a href="#h82-0-4" id="h82-0-4" class="d">----
   5465 </a><a href="#h82-0-5" id="h82-0-5" class="d">-
   5466 </a><a href="#h82-0-6" id="h82-0-6" class="d">-Lorem markdownum teneri dives, vota inarsit, numina qui mixto. Oculos quo vestro fero inrequieta magni. Ad inania pedes et volucrem, sub ex facti, nec huc curvamina! Semina cum sonitusque fraterno Meriones animas pervenit iusta populos faciem. Colebat et saepe!
   5467 </a><a href="#h82-0-7" id="h82-0-7" class="d">-
   5468 </a><a href="#h82-0-8" id="h82-0-8" class="d">-1. Et Hectoris quaeque
   5469 </a><a href="#h82-0-9" id="h82-0-9" class="d">-2. Noctis pars
   5470 </a><a href="#h82-0-10" id="h82-0-10" class="d">-3. Possint dimittere poscitur
   5471 </a><a href="#h82-0-11" id="h82-0-11" class="d">-4. Sine praemia
   5472 </a><a href="#h82-0-12" id="h82-0-12" class="d">-5. Genae et sed in regia sonitum non
   5473 </a><a href="#h82-0-13" id="h82-0-13" class="d">-6. Preme ne perstant non intrarit cura
   5474 </a><a href="#h82-0-14" id="h82-0-14" class="d">-
   5475 </a><a href="#h82-0-15" id="h82-0-15" class="d">-## Et habenas honoratas
   5476 </a><a href="#h82-0-16" id="h82-0-16" class="d">-
   5477 </a><a href="#h82-0-17" id="h82-0-17" class="d">-Modo talia, nebulae quem. Sed ducit ossaque humilis lumine, excusantia Actorides nec deus. Nec tuas pares regia, inops ne ponti, quamquam, et! Cautes viae capillos communis parce, sub curva dat **nota et**. Quaeritis inopino ligavit ne perque moriens numquam, mox iaculum apta Ciris, sunt.
   5478 </a><a href="#h82-0-18" id="h82-0-18" class="d">-
   5479 </a><a href="#h82-0-19" id="h82-0-19" class="d">-Perit semideique copia. Quod tu, et **enim** inmurmurat perque, nocent adfectat ut acrior [missi](#per-inproba). Romanae est! Stipite hasta micante, puppe canities matris virgineosque duo rursus tamen mundus perque deus. Languescuntque Interea contigit ipsosque, est ore [esset](#umbrosum-medius-esse); coronae mandatam quaque os per, deique caedis.
   5480 </a><a href="#h82-0-20" id="h82-0-20" class="d">-
   5481 </a><a href="#h82-0-21" id="h82-0-21" class="d">-- Ille inclusit summa forem arborea tactus in
   5482 </a><a href="#h82-0-22" id="h82-0-22" class="d">-- Tellure refert
   5483 </a><a href="#h82-0-23" id="h82-0-23" class="d">-- Huic quantum credere terram
   5484 </a><a href="#h82-0-24" id="h82-0-24" class="d">-
   5485 </a><a href="#h82-0-25" id="h82-0-25" class="d">-## Aversa et sinistra flava praemia proelia ala
   5486 </a><a href="#h82-0-26" id="h82-0-26" class="d">-
   5487 </a><a href="#h82-0-27" id="h82-0-27" class="d">-Suos Pana pudori concubiturus paelex glomeravit, certare querellis, deus salutem tantaeque nomina: [stetit respiramen ad](#ferox-impete-misso). Precor audistis cunctari arce tenui Hippomene satis prospiciens et hinc albentia Lyaeus, nec timetis, in. Iam flavum cantus, Iove Pharonque in linquit _attollit_, cum? Versus tendentem et fecere amnis incola vulgares Cereris unguis ignibus obstipuit despexit, desierant componit nec imis capro horrida. Iove splendescunt agebat nubila favete cornibus ducit eadem in inde ignes dixit annis dona habemus litora?
   5488 </a><a href="#h82-0-28" id="h82-0-28" class="d">-
   5489 </a><a href="#h82-0-29" id="h82-0-29" class="d">-&gt; Labores ille Thespiades inde, capellae dedi adire cortice! Velant aestuat per extis Mimasque figuram. Pelias concilio credentes induxerat fidem dedit; opem ut flumina quae vulnus specie permanet. Possent non facti pelagi faveas; incubat non et certans. Medea et: tota Dite.
   5490 </a><a href="#h82-0-30" id="h82-0-30" class="d">-
   5491 </a><a href="#h82-0-31" id="h82-0-31" class="d">-Viri vidit rubor inquit: cum **piscem naides** ut, sed forcipe nunc arte vulnera naturaque plus, amo. Partim Tritoniaca nimbos quid causam corpore fuit arces ieiunia sagitta tetigere me, quam duce. Volebat **revocata nate**. Tu orbem locuturo prius dextera vesana _hostes adspicias facit_, inde quos.
   5492 </a><a href="#h82-0-32" id="h82-0-32" class="d">-
   5493 </a><a href="#h82-0-33" id="h82-0-33" class="d">-Hoc et ambo ortu ficta iuvencae crescentem debuerant caedis eo illis sceleratae somni. Pamphagos lapsu me idque lacertis, est pressos, dum. Estque dubitabat tamen gurgite est adicit de Epaphi pulveris cinerem colles _eadem publica_ vox unam _fecisse_ palmas Mopsus. In Mycenida fessos subsequitur **femina** notas: in vocato tamen glaciali.
   5494 </a><b>diff --git a/<a id="h83" href="../file/src/scss/_config.scss.html">src/scss/_config.scss</a> b/<a href="../file/src/scss/_config.scss.html">src/scss/_config.scss</a></b>

   5747 </a>     const dateObject = new Date(value);
   5748      return dateObject.toLocaleDateString();
   5749    },
   5750 <a href="#h95-0-3" id="h95-0-3" class="i">+
   5751 </a><a href="#h95-0-4" id="h95-0-4" class="i">+  logger: function (value) {
   5752 </a><a href="#h95-0-5" id="h95-0-5" class="i">+    console.log(value);
   5753 </a><a href="#h95-0-6" id="h95-0-6" class="i">+  },
   5754 </a> };
